String.Source: Heljarchen Hall.
String.Dest: 勇士堑山庄。

String.Source: Our new home! I wonder if there's room for a forge?
String.Dest: 我们的新家！我想知道这儿有熔炉吗？

String.Source: Windstad Manor.
String.Dest: 文斯塔德庄园

String.Source: Our new home! I wonder if there's room for a forge?
String.Dest: 我们的新家！我想知道这儿有熔炉吗？

String.Source: Lakeview Manor.
String.Dest: 湖景林居。

String.Source: Our new home! I wonder if there's room for a forge?
String.Dest: 我们的新家！我想知道这儿有熔炉吗？

String.Source: Let's live in my house in Solitude.
String.Dest: 让我们住在我在独孤城的房子里吧。

String.Source: Our new home! I wonder if there's room for a forge?
String.Dest: 我们的新家！我在想这里有没有空间放个熔炉？

String.Source: How about my house in Windhelm?
String.Dest: 我在风盔城的房子怎么样？

String.Source: Our new home! I wonder if there's room for a forge?
String.Dest: 我们的新家！我在想这里有没有空间放个熔炉？

String.Source: My house in Markarth would be perfect.
String.Dest: 我在马卡斯城的房子将会很完美。

String.Source: Our new home! I wonder if there's room for a forge?
String.Dest: 我们的新家！我在想这里有没有空间放个熔炉？

String.Source: I have a house in Riften.
String.Dest: 我在裂谷城有栋房子。

String.Source: Our new home! I wonder if there's room for a forge?
String.Dest: 我们的新家！我在想这里有没有空间放个熔炉？

String.Source: We could live in my house in Whiterun.
String.Dest: 我们可以住在我在雪漫城的房子里。

String.Source: Our new home! I wonder if there's room for a forge?
String.Dest: 我们的新家！我在想这里有没有空间放个熔炉？

String.Source: Living with you would be perfect.
String.Dest: 和你一起生活将会很完美。

String.Source: Brilliant. I'll meet you there.
String.Dest: 太好了。我们到那儿见。

String.Source: RelationshipMarriagePostWeddingLoveInterestBlockingTopic
String.Dest: RelationshipMarriagePostWeddingLoveInterestBlockingTopic

String.Source: So we're married! All that's left now is deciding on a place to live.
String.Dest: 所以，我们结婚了！现在剩下的是决定住的地方。

String.Source: Heljarchen Hall.
String.Dest: 勇士堑山庄。

String.Source: Wonderful. I'll see you there.
String.Dest: 太棒了。我在那里等你。

String.Source: Windstad Manor.
String.Dest: 文斯塔德庄园

String.Source: Wonderful. I'll see you there.
String.Dest: 太棒了。我在那里等你。

String.Source: Lakeview Manor.
String.Dest: 湖景林居。

String.Source: Wonderful. I'll see you there.
String.Dest: 太棒了。我在那里等你。

String.Source: I'd like us to move somewhere else.
String.Dest: 我想我们得移动到别的地方。

String.Source: Oh? Where should we move to?
String.Dest: 哦？现在我们该去哪？

String.Source: Proudspire Manor, my house in Solitude.
String.Dest: 傲矛别墅，我在独孤城的家。

String.Source: Wonderful. I'll see you there.
String.Dest: 太棒了。我在那里等你。

String.Source: Hjerim, my house in Windhelm.
String.Dest: 霜宅，我在风盔城的房子。

String.Source: Wonderful. I'll see you there.
String.Dest: 太棒了。我在那里等你。

String.Source: Vlindrel Hall, my house in Markarth.
String.Dest: 林德尔会堂，我在马卡斯城的房子。

String.Source: Wonderful. I'll see you there.
String.Dest: 太棒了。我在那里等你。

String.Source: Honeyside, my house in Riften.
String.Dest: 甜蜜湾，我在裂谷城的房子。

String.Source: Wonderful. I'll see you there.
String.Dest: 太棒了。我在那里等你。

String.Source: Breezehome, my house in Whiterun.
String.Dest: 风宅，我在雪漫城的房子。

String.Source: Wonderful. I'll see you there.
String.Dest: 太棒了。我在那里等你。

String.Source: Your old place would suit us just fine.
String.Dest: 你的老地方会很适合我们的。

String.Source: Brilliant. I'll meet you there.
String.Dest: 太好了。我们到那儿见。

String.Source: Would you mind cooking something for me?
String.Dest: 你介意帮我煮点吃的吗？

String.Source: Here you are, my love. I actually think my cooking has improved since you brought me that book. Of course, I'll let you be the judge.
String.Dest: 尝尝这个，亲爱的。我真觉得你带那本书给我后我的厨艺提高了。当然，高不高，由你说了算喽。

String.Source: Would you mind cooking something for me?
String.Dest: 你介意帮我煮点吃的吗？

String.Source: I'm better with swords than soup, but this should be edible. I hope.
String.Dest: 我应该带把剑而不是带碗汤，但汤能用来填肚子。至少我希望它能。

String.Source: Would you mind cooking something for me?
String.Dest: 你介意帮我煮点吃的吗？

String.Source: You have quite the appetite, my love. I'll have something for you on the morrow.
String.Dest: 你的胃口不错啊，亲爱的。我明天一早就给你做点好的。

String.Source: Has the store made any money?
String.Dest: 商店有赚钱吗？

String.Source: Business has been good, my love. Here is your share.
String.Dest: 生意不错，亲爱的，这是你的份。

String.Source: Goodbye, my love.
String.Dest: 再见，我的宝贝。

String.Source: Farewell, my love.
String.Dest: 再见了，亲爱的。

String.Source: A blacksmith's steel is a blacksmith's pride. But for a true hero, it's not the metals you forge, but the bonds.
String.Dest: 铁匠的产品就是铁匠的脸面。而对于真正的英雄，你的荣耀不在于锻造的器物，而是缔结的盟约。

String.Source: I'll be with you in spirit, my love. In the steel you hold in your hand, and the memories you keep in your heart.
String.Dest: 我的心与你同在，亲爱的，和你的剑一起握在你手里，和你的记忆一起藏在你心中。

String.Source: Don't forget love, you're your own hero. You don't have to live up to any other. You be yourself. That's the person I fell in love with.
String.Dest: Don't forget love, you're your own hero. You don't have to live up to any other. You be yourself. That's the person I fell in love with.

String.Source: Safe journeys, my love.
String.Dest: 一路顺风，亲爱的。

String.Source: Safe journeys, my love.
String.Dest: 一路顺风，亲爱的。

String.Source: So this is our home. It's beautiful. I can't think of a better place to spend my days, and a better person to spend them with.
String.Dest: 所以这是我们的家。太棒了。我想不出一个更好的地方来度过我人生中的最美好时光，也找不出一个更好的人来陪我走过这些时光了。

String.Source: It's a wonderful home, my love. The city already has a blacksmith, but maybe I can start a small store.
String.Dest: 这真是个完美的家，亲爱的。虽然这里已经有一家铁匠了，但或许我还可以再开一间小店。

String.Source: Welcome home, my love.
String.Dest: 欢迎回家，亲爱的。

String.Source: It's good to have you home, my love. I can't wait to hear about your adventures.
String.Dest: 真高兴你回家了，亲爱的。我等不及要听听你的冒险了。

String.Source: What do you need, my love?
String.Dest: 你需要什么，亲爱的？

String.Source: I was thinking we need more space to display your trophies, but it might look like we're showing off. A good hero stays humble.
String.Dest: 我在想是不是得有个大点的空间来展示你的战利品，可那又有点炫耀的感觉是吧。一个正直的英雄应该保持低调。

String.Source: It's funny, I thought having to take care place like this would make me lose my smithing touch, but I think I've gotten better.
String.Dest: 说来挺有意思的，我本来还以为照管这个家会让我生疏了打铁的手感，但似乎我的手艺反倒有所进步。

String.Source: One of the scryers was saying it's going to be a bit chilly tomorrow. Don't know if I believe in that stuff, but bring some furs just in case.
String.Dest: 一个占卜者说明天会有点儿冷。不知道我该不该相信那种东西，但还是带些毛皮以防万一吧。

String.Source: Hm...oh, sorry love, just lost in thought. Can't seem to remember where I put my hammer. I just got an idea for a new dagger.
String.Dest: 嗯……哦，抱歉亲爱的，我只是在思考问题。我记不起我把我的锤子放在哪儿了。我突然有了打造一把新匕首的灵感。

String.Source: Remember to get your rest, love. It's like quenching a blade. Experiences mean nothing if you don't take the time to reflect on them.
String.Dest: 记住要好好休息，亲爱的。它就像是给刀刃淬火。经验是指你在这件事情上学到了多少，而不是做这件事情多久。

String.Source: I might not be home for lunch next week. Some of the folks in town invited me to the tavern for a drink. But maybe I'll find an excuse by then.
String.Dest: 我下星期可能不会回家吃午饭了。镇上的一些人邀请我去酒馆喝一杯。但也许到那时候我会找个借口。

String.Source: I tried baking an apple dumpling yesterday. And no, I didn't fill the insides with hinges and nails. It just tastes like I did.
String.Dest: 我昨天试着做了一个苹果派。而且里面没有加铰链和钉子。还是熟悉的味道啊。

String.Source: I wonder how the family is doing back in Kvatch. After all, the forge is still important, even if the clients aren't.
String.Dest: 我不知道这家人回科瓦奇城做些什么。毕竟锻造厂才是最重要的。即使是客人也没那重要。

String.Source: I nicked my finger the other day cutting fruit. But the things are so calloused, it's like trying to draw blood from a stone.
String.Dest: 几天前，我切水果割到手指头了。但是事情跟预想的不太一样，刀子割到我的手上就像是那把刀想要给一块石头放血一样。

String.Source: A blacksmith's steel is a blacksmith's pride. But for a true hero, it's not the metals you forge, but the bonds.
String.Dest: 铁匠的产品就是铁匠的脸面。而对于真正的英雄，你的荣耀不在于锻造的器物，而是缔结的盟约。

String.Source: Remember to get your rest, love. It's like quenching a blade. Experiences mean nothing if you don't take the time to reflect on them.
String.Dest: 记住要好好休息，亲爱的。它就像是给刀刃淬火。经验是指你在这件事情上学到了多少，而不是做这件事情多久。

String.Source: Oh, um...right. Forgive me, I need some time alone.
String.Dest: 噢，呃……对。抱歉啊，我得一个人静一静。

String.Source: I'm sorry. I can't return those feelings.
String.Dest: I'm sorry. I can't return those feelings.

String.Source: Of course I'll fashion a blade for you. After all you've done for this city, I'd be honored.
String.Dest: 我当然会为你造一把剑。毕竟你的所作所为都是为了这座城市，这是我的荣幸。

String.Source: Interested in me, are you?
String.Dest: 你对我有兴趣，没错吧？

String.Source: I know you don't like crafting for nobles, but how about a Thane?
String.Dest: 我知道你不愿意为贵族干活儿，可要是为男爵，那么可以吗？

String.Source: Although, to be honest, I'm a little worried what it might say.
String.Dest: 尽管……说实话，我有点担心它会说些什么。

String.Source: Interested in me, are you?
String.Dest: 你对我有兴趣，没错吧？

String.Source: I know you don't like crafting for nobles, but how about a Thane?
String.Dest: 我知道你不愿意为贵族干活儿，可要是为男爵，那么可以吗？

String.Source: I've heard that in Orc Strongholds, the forge wife will craft a weapon for the chief on their wedding day.
String.Dest: 我听说，在兽人堡垒，做铁匠的妻子会在婚礼日为丈夫打造一件武器。

String.Source: Interested in me, are you?
String.Dest: 你对我有兴趣，没错吧？

String.Source: Why is that?
String.Dest: 那是怎么一回事？

String.Source: It'll convey all her feelings, desires, fears...and in the blade, he'll see her naked for the first time.
String.Dest: 、我会传达她所有的感情，欲望，恐惧。。。恕我直言，他会初次看见她的裸体.

String.Source: Interested in me, are you?
String.Dest: 你对我有兴趣，没错吧？

String.Source: Why is that?
String.Dest: 那是怎么一回事？

String.Source: So what I suppose I'm saying is, I couldn't craft you a weapon without telling you how I feel.
String.Dest: 所以我想，我要说的是，我根本不能在告诉你的我感受之前，就为你打造一把武器。

String.Source: Interested in me, are you?
String.Dest: 你对我有兴趣，没错吧？

String.Source: Why is that?
String.Dest: 那是怎么一回事？

String.Source: And it's one thing for me to say it now, and another thing for you to carry it with you.
String.Dest: 我就强调一点，别的事你看着办吧。

String.Source: Interested in me, are you?
String.Dest: 你对我有兴趣，没错吧？

String.Source: Why is that?
String.Dest: 那是怎么一回事？

String.Source: It depends. I've been taught that emotions are a powerful part of smithing.
String.Dest: 那要看看了。我一直被教导说情感也是锻造的一个重要部分。

String.Source: Interested in me, are you?
String.Dest: 你对我有兴趣，没错吧？

String.Source: What would you say is your expertise?
String.Dest: 你想说这是你的专长？

String.Source: When I craft a shield, I think of the soldier's child praying for a safe return. For a sword, I envision a man getting revenge for a brother's death.
String.Dest: 当我打造盾牌，我会想到士兵的孩子祈祷他们的父亲平安归来。而对于剑，我会想象到有人会为他兄弟的死报仇。

String.Source: Interested in me, are you?
String.Dest: 你对我有兴趣，没错吧？

String.Source: What would you say is your expertise?
String.Dest: 你想说这是你的专长？

String.Source: When I imagine a soldier marching off to battle, or a hero vanquishing a great evil, that's when my hammer feels most inspired.
String.Dest: 当我想象一个士兵行军去战斗，亦或是一位英雄战胜了邪恶之后，都会让我的战锤感觉激昂万分。

String.Source: Interested in me, are you?
String.Dest: 你对我有兴趣，没错吧？

String.Source: What would you say is your expertise?
String.Dest: 你想说这是你的专长？

String.Source: Just to know that I was a part of that, that it was my steel...it just takes your breath away thinking about it.
String.Dest: 只需知道我是其中的一部分,它是我的武器……仅仅是想到它就会让你无法呼吸。

String.Source: Interested in me, are you?
String.Dest: 你对我有兴趣，没错吧？

String.Source: What would you say is your expertise?
String.Dest: 你想说这是你的专长？

String.Source: And I will spend the rest of my life with you, whether it's me in your arms, or my sword in your hands.
String.Dest: 无论将来遇到什么样的困难，我将会与你共度余生。

String.Source: There's no need to fret. I want to spend the rest of my life with you. Marry me.
String.Dest: 不要犹豫了，我想与你共度余生。跟我结婚吧。

String.Source: Talk to the priest in Riften. We can marry at the Temple of Mara.
String.Dest: 跟裂谷城的祭司谈谈。我们可以在玛拉神庙里结婚。

String.Source: There's no need to fret. I want to spend the rest of my life with you. Marry me.
String.Dest: 不要犹豫了，我想与你共度余生。跟我结婚吧。

String.Source: An Amulet of Mara. Someone like yourself deserves a wife who can repair your armor, and forge your weapons.
String.Dest: 你戴着玛拉的护符。像你这样的人也应该有一个妻子来为你修补铠甲，磨砺宝剑。

String.Source: I'm excited about our wedding, but I know how busy a hero can be. Let me know when you've talked to the priest.
String.Dest: I'm excited about our wedding, but I know how busy a hero can be. Let me know when you've talked to the priest.

String.Source: Hello.
String.Dest: 哈啰。

String.Source: Hello.
String.Dest: 你好。

String.Source: Here. I got this for you. Just a small token of my gratitude.
String.Dest: 来，这个送给你，只是个表达我心意的小礼物。

String.Source: Milord, the axe is ready, but it has to be now!
String.Dest: 老爷，斧头是准备好了，就是此时此刻！

String.Source: You want to do this now? I suppose I could. All I really need is the blood.
String.Dest: 你想现在就做吗？我想我可以。我真正需要的就是鲜血。

String.Source: I had some good teachers.
String.Dest: 我有过很多好老师。

String.Source: Lod, I'm thinking about using fire salts to provide extra heat to the forge. What do you think?
String.Dest: 罗德，我想用火盐给熔铁炉加热。你怎么看？

String.Source: Damn all this bureaucracy! The soldiers in the field need those weapons now!
String.Dest: 去你妈的官僚主义！ 这些战场上的士兵现在就需要武器！

String.Source: Karras, what's the word on that contract? I've got a stock of weapons and armor ready to go.
String.Dest: 卡拉斯，契约上写了什么？ 我得准备去进一批武器和盔甲的货了。

String.Source: Oh, I'm sorry. What happened to them?
String.Dest: 哦，我很抱歉。他们怎么啦？

String.Source: Anum-La, I'd love to fashion a blade for you. Does your company have a sigil?
String.Dest: Anum-La, I'd love to fashion a blade for you. Does your company have a sigil?

String.Source: Yes Lod?
String.Dest: 什么事，罗德?

String.Source: Great. I even had some time leftover to get started on that special order. Here, have a look.
String.Dest: Great. I even had some time leftover to get started on that special order. Here, have a look.

String.Source: I also left out one other detail. Forging the axe requires a blood sacrifice.
String.Dest: 我还漏掉了另一个细节。 锻造斧头需要鲜血的献祭。

String.Source: Do you mean like witchcraft? You're talking nonsense, love, I didn't marry a heathen.
String.Dest: 你的意思是像巫术吗？你在说胡话，亲爱的，我可没有嫁给一个异教徒。

String.Source: I also left out one other detail. Forging the axe requires a blood sacrifice.
String.Dest: 我还漏掉了另一个细节。 锻造斧头需要鲜血的献祭。

String.Source: Now if you want me to quench the axe in blood, that I've done. In fact, you're the third person to ask me that this week.
String.Dest: 现在，如果你想要我用血淬炼这把斧子，那我已经做到了。事实上，你已经是这周第三个要我这么做的人了。

String.Source: I also left out one other detail. Forging the axe requires a blood sacrifice.
String.Dest: 我还漏掉了另一个细节。 锻造斧头需要鲜血的献祭。

String.Source: I'll tell you what I told the others. The forge in Kvatch is special, and it isn't just the blood.
String.Dest: 我将会告诉你我对别人说了什么。科瓦奇城中的熔炉不同于一般，而且不仅仅是血液。

String.Source: I also left out one other detail. Forging the axe requires a blood sacrifice.
String.Dest: 我还漏掉了另一个细节。 锻造斧头需要鲜血的献祭。

String.Source: Do you mean like witchcraft? I'm a smith, not a hagraven.
String.Dest: 你的意思是像巫术吗？我是个铁匠，不是乌鸦鬼婆。

String.Source: I also left out one other detail. Forging the axe requires a blood sacrifice.
String.Dest: 我还漏掉了另一个细节。 锻造斧头需要鲜血的献祭。

String.Source: Now if you want me to quench the axe in blood, that I've done. In fact, you're the third person to ask me that this week.
String.Dest: 现在，如果你想要我用血淬炼这把斧子，那我已经做到了。事实上，你已经是这周第三个要我这么做的人了。

String.Source: I also left out one other detail. Forging the axe requires a blood sacrifice.
String.Dest: 我还漏掉了另一个细节。 锻造斧头需要鲜血的献祭。

String.Source: I'll tell you what I told the others. The forge in Kvatch is special, and it isn't just the blood.
String.Dest: 我将会告诉你我对别人说了什么。科瓦奇城中的熔炉不同于一般，而且不仅仅是血液。

String.Source: It's something only you can do. I need the blade quenched in a person's blood.
String.Dest: 有些事儿非你不成。我想用某人的血为这把刀淬火。

String.Source: Now that's a strange request. Not in and of itself, but you're the third person to ask me that this week.
String.Dest: 这还真是个奇怪的请求。到不是因为这个请求本身奇怪，它奇怪的地方在于你是本周第三个向我提出这一请求的人了。

String.Source: It's something only you can do. I need the blade quenched in a person's blood.
String.Dest: 有些事儿非你不成。我想用某人的血为这把刀淬火。

String.Source: I'll tell you what I told the others. The forge in Kvatch is special, and it isn't just for blood.
String.Dest: 我对你和对其他人说的都一样。在科瓦奇锻造是非常特殊的一件事，那不仅仅需要鲜血。

String.Source: Actually, it's not a new axe. I need you to reforge an old one.
String.Dest: 其实，这不是一个新的斧头。 我需要你重铸一个旧的。

String.Source: Are you sure? It's much easier to make a new one. Re-forging is something you do with family heirlooms and the like.
String.Dest: 你确定？造一把新的不是更简单么？你怎么搞得像是要打造出一只传家宝来似的。

String.Source: I don't know, forge it out of some combination of orichalcum and stahlrim.
String.Dest: 我不知道，这玩意是由星陨石与魔冰混合锻造出来的。

String.Source: I'm afraid I don't have any of the latter, nor can I even forge a blade using two separate metals. I'm a smith, love, not an alchemist.
String.Dest: 恐怕我这里没有后面这种材料，我甚至根本不可能把两种金属混合在一起来造一把剑。我是个铁匠，亲爱的，不是炼金术师。

String.Source: I don't know, forge it out of some combination of orichalcum and stahlrim.
String.Dest: 我不知道，这玩意是由星陨石与魔冰混合锻造出来的。

String.Source: I'm afraid I don't have any of the latter, nor can I even forge a blade using two separate metals. I'm a smith, not an alchemist.
String.Dest: 恐怕我这里没有后面这种材料，我甚至根本不可能把两种金属混合在一起来造一把剑。我是个铁匠，亲爱的，不是炼金术师。

String.Source: It's not for me. It's for the future High Queen of Skyrim.
String.Dest: 这不是为了我，这是为了天际未来的至高女王。

String.Source: You mean Elisif? Wouldn't that be a whole lot of egg on Ulfric's face, to win the war and still lose the crown. But I suppose anything's possible.
String.Dest: 你是指艾莉西弗？那乌佛瑞克不是搬起石头砸了自己的脚吗？赢得了战争却还是没得到王位。不过我还是觉得一切皆有可能。

String.Source: It's not for me. It's for the future High Queen of Skyrim.
String.Dest: 这不是为了我，这是为了天际未来的至高女王。

String.Source: Although there's been talk of another. A child descended from Ysgramor himself. I wonder how you could even prove that.
String.Dest: 不过还有另一个人选。一个继承了伊斯格拉谟血脉的孩子。我想知道你要怎样去证明。

String.Source: It's not for me. It's for the future High Queen of Skyrim.
String.Dest: 这不是为了我，这是为了天际未来的至高女王。

String.Source: You mean Elisif? I'm not keen on making weapons for figureheads. I much rather make a weapon for General Tullius.
String.Dest: 你指艾利西弗？我不会给傀儡王做武器。我选择给图留斯将军做武器。

String.Source: It's not for me. It's for the future High Queen of Skyrim.
String.Dest: 这不是为了我，这是为了天际未来的至高女王。

String.Source: Although there's been talk of another. A child descended from Ysgramor himself. I wonder how you could even prove that.
String.Dest: 不过还有另一个人选。一个继承了伊斯格拉谟血脉的孩子。我想知道你要怎样去证明。

String.Source: Of course, my love. I wouldn't be a very good wife if I didn't. Or a good blacksmith, for that matter.
String.Dest: 当然了，亲爱的。如果我做不到，就不算是个好妻子，更别说是个好铁匠了。

String.Source: My love, I was wondering if you could lend your skills to forge an axe.
String.Dest: 亲爱的，我想知道能否借用你的技能打造一把斧头。

String.Source: I'll need to know what kind of metal, and the rest I'll tailor to your weight. You've lost a few pounds, haven't you. Don't think I didn't notice.
String.Dest: 我需要了解用什么种类的金属，然后我要根据你的体重来定制。你瘦了几磅是不是？不要认为我没发现。

String.Source: My love, I was wondering if you could lend your skills to forge an axe.
String.Dest: 亲爱的，我想知道能否借用你的技能打造一把斧头。

String.Source: Of course. I wouldn't be a very good blacksmith if I turned down requests, especially from a true hero.
String.Dest: 当然。要是我拒绝了别人的要求，那我就不是一位好铁匠，更何况这可是来自一位真正的英雄的要求。

String.Source: Isobel, I was wondering if you could lend your skills to forge an axe.
String.Dest: 伊莎贝尔，我非常想知道如果你用你的技能来锻造一把斧子是怎样。

String.Source: Just tell me what kind of metal and I'll take care of it.
String.Dest: 只要告诉我要什么样的金属，剩下的我包了。

String.Source: Isobel, I was wondering if you could lend your skills to forge an axe.
String.Dest: 伊莎贝尔，我非常想知道如果你用你的技能来锻造一把斧子是怎样。

String.Source: This isn't just any axe. Most smiths would strangle a puppy for such a chance.
String.Dest: 这可不是把普通的斧子。大部分铁匠会为了这个机会干掉一个小嫩芽。

String.Source: Oh, I never said I wouldn't. Forge the axe, not strangle a small animal. That's just disgusting.
String.Dest: 哦，我可从没说过我不会。我打造一把斧头，才不是为了杀死什么小动物的。这样做只会让人感到恶心。

String.Source: This isn't just any axe. Most smiths would strangle a puppy for such a chance.
String.Dest: 这可不是把普通的斧子。大部分铁匠会为了这个机会干掉一个小嫩芽。

String.Source: In any case, from what it sounds like, this queen would unite Skyrim, and that's bad news for the dragons and the Thalmor.
String.Dest: 总而言之，它的意思是说这位女皇将统一整个天际，那对龙族和梭默来讲可是个坏消息。

String.Source: Thane Larsdon doesn't want war. Just a chance to present another option.
String.Dest: 劳斯登男爵不希望战争。这只是一个呈现出另一种选择的机会。

String.Source: Aye, he must think the legends and the names will be enough. Ysgramor's, and maybe even yours. I can't say I disagree.
String.Dest: 哎，他一定认为那些传说和名字就已经足够了。伊斯格拉谟的，甚至可能是你的。我不能说我不同意。

String.Source: This isn't exactly a request, if you get my meaning.
String.Dest: 这根本不是个请求，懂？

String.Source: Do you think that's how a marriage works? You make threats and your wife does your bidding? You still have a lot to learn, my love.
String.Dest: 你认为怎么做婚姻才能完美呢？你出口威胁而你的妻子唯命是从吗？你还有好些东西要学，亲爱的。

String.Source: This isn't exactly a request, if you get my meaning.
String.Dest: 这根本不是个请求，懂？

String.Source: You obviously don't know me very well. Threats won't work on me.
String.Dest: 你显然不了解你的妻子，我是不畏惧威胁的。

String.Source: They want to claim the throne via the Kingsmoot. No blood will be shed.
String.Dest: 他们想通过领主大会吓吓领主。不会流血。

String.Source: True, the Nord said as much. "No true-blooded Nord would challenge the kin of Ysgramor."
String.Dest: 正是这样，这诺德人也说， 没有热血的诺德人才会挑战伊斯格拉莫的亲戚。

String.Source: The Empire is flaccid and kneels to the Thalmor. We need a strong ruler.
String.Dest: 帝国是软弱得居然被梭默打败。我们需要一个强大的统治者。

String.Source: Sounds like another Ulfric. But if the Stormcloaks were trying to claim the throne by Divine right, I would be less inclined to hate them.
String.Dest: 听起来像翻版的乌佛瑞克。但是如果风暴斗篷要以圣灵的名义要求王位，我就不会这么讨厌他们了。

String.Source: What about the other person? Anything on him?
String.Dest: 其他人呢？他们有任何关于他的消息吗？

String.Source: Don't know. One of them was a charming Nord, but not the sharing type. The other one, he was the opposite.
String.Dest: 不知道。其中一个是位英俊的诺德人，但他不是会那种懂得分享的类型。而另一个人则恰恰相反。

String.Source: What about the other person? Anything on him?
String.Dest: 其他人呢？他们有任何关于他的消息吗？

String.Source: He told me all sorts of tales about a child of destiny and an axe to slay a legendary beast. Of course, I ate up every word.
String.Dest: 他告诉我诸如一个小孩的命运和一把屠杀巨兽的斧头之类的故事。当然，我总是左耳进右耳出。

String.Source: What about the other person? Anything on him?
String.Dest: 其他人呢？他们有任何关于他的消息吗？

String.Source: But at the same time, I don't know about forging weapons for anyone but the Empire.
String.Dest: 与此同时，我也不知道除了帝国我还能帮谁打造兵器。

String.Source: Sounds like Larsdon. I was asking on his behalf.
String.Dest: 听起来像是劳斯登。我是他的代表。

String.Source: So is it true then? This whole thing about a descendant of Ysgramor? I'm a bit conflicted.
String.Dest: 所以那么这是真的了？这整件事都是关于一个伊斯格拉谟的后裔的？我在心理斗争。

String.Source: Sounds like Larsdon. I was asking on his behalf.
String.Dest: 听起来像是劳斯登。我是他的代表。

String.Source: I'd never forge arms against the Empire. But the chance to forge a weapon to slay a legendary beast? Aye, that's a job for your wife.
String.Dest: 我从未打造过武器去对抗帝国。但有机会去打造一把武器杀死传说中的野兽？哦是啊，这正是你妻子的工作。

String.Source: Sounds like Larsdon. I was asking on his behalf.
String.Dest: 听起来像是劳斯登。我是他的代表。

String.Source: So is it true then? This whole thing about a descendant of Ysgramor? I'm a bit conflicted.
String.Dest: 所以那么这是真的了？这整件事都是关于一个伊斯格拉谟的后裔的？我在心理斗争。

String.Source: Sounds like Larsdon. I was asking on his behalf.
String.Dest: 听起来像是劳斯登。我是他的代表。

String.Source: I'd never forge arms against the Empire. But the chance to forge a weapon to slay a legendary beast? Aye, that's a job for me.
String.Dest: 我永远不会制作武器来对付帝国的。不过拿去宰一头传说中的野兽？那是我要干的活。

String.Source: Who were these other people?
String.Dest: 所谓的其他人指的是谁？

String.Source: Two Nords, could've easily been brothers. Come separately though, so they couldn't have known each other.
String.Dest: 悠悠诺德，拳拳之心，一对兄弟，彼此分离，相逢不识。

String.Source: Who were these other people?
String.Dest: 所谓的其他人指的是谁？

String.Source: One of them dropped your name a couple times, to point out the urgency of his quest. Maybe he was trying to impress me as well.
String.Dest: 他们中的一个提到了你的名字几次，来指出他任务的紧迫，还是说他是想打动我。

String.Source: Who were these other people?
String.Dest: 所谓的其他人指的是谁？

String.Source: So I told him, you know the Dragonborn? Well I'm bloody married to him!
String.Dest: 然后我就告诉他，你知道龙裔吗? 我他妈嫁给了他！

String.Source: Who were these other people?
String.Dest: 所谓的其他人指的是谁？

String.Source: Two Nords, could've easily been brothers. Come separately though, so they couldn't have known each other.
String.Dest: 悠悠诺德，拳拳之心，一对兄弟，彼此分离，相逢不识。

String.Source: Who were these other people?
String.Dest: 所谓的其他人指的是谁？

String.Source: One of them dropped your name a couple times, to point out the urgency of his quest. Maybe he was trying to impress me as well.
String.Dest: 他们中的一个提到了你的名字几次，来指出他任务的紧迫，还是说他是想打动我。

String.Source: Who were these other people?
String.Dest: 所谓的其他人指的是谁？

String.Source: So I told him, you know the Dragonborn? Well I'm bloody married to her!
String.Dest: So I told him, you know the Dragonborn? Well I'm bloody married to her!

String.Source: Who were these other people?
String.Dest: 所谓的其他人指的是谁？

String.Source: Two Nords, could've easily been brothers. Come separately though, so they couldn't have known each other.
String.Dest: 悠悠诺德，拳拳之心，一对兄弟，彼此分离，相逢不识。

String.Source: Who were these other people?
String.Dest: 所谓的其他人指的是谁？

String.Source: One of them dropped your name a couple times, to point out the urgency of his quest. Maybe he was trying to impress me as well.
String.Dest: 他们中的一个提到了你的名字几次，来指出他任务的紧迫，还是说他是想打动我。

String.Source: I assume you explained this to the ones who came before me.
String.Dest: 我猜你已经把这事解释给我之前来的那个人听了吧。

String.Source: I did, to the one who knew you anyway. I told him I would love to forge his legendary axe, but he needed to fetch me some bloodgrass first.
String.Dest: 我会做的。反正那个人认识你。我会告诉他我很乐意给他造把传奇斧子，但首先他得给我拿些血草来。

String.Source: I assume you explained this to the ones who came before me.
String.Dest: 我猜你已经把这事解释给我之前来的那个人听了吧。

String.Source: It may grow in bundles outside our forge, but good luck finding it anywhere else outside Oblivion.
String.Dest: 它大概生长在我们的锻铁炉以外的地方，不过幸运的是在外面湮没世界里到处都能找到。

String.Source: I assume you explained this to the ones who came before me.
String.Dest: 我猜你已经把这事解释给我之前来的那个人听了吧。

String.Source: Without it, I can't make the oil. So I sent him off to talk to Cyrus with the East Empire Company, and see if he can't get it shipped sooner.
String.Dest: 没有它的话，我就不能上油了。所以我打发他去东帝国贸易公司和赛勒斯谈谈,看看他能不能更快的把它运到。

String.Source: I assume you explained this to the ones who came before me.
String.Dest: 我猜你已经把这事解释给我之前来的那个人听了吧。

String.Source: Maybe you ought to head over to Windhelm and see if it's been taken care of.
String.Dest: 也许你应该去风舵城然后看看它是否被搞定了。

String.Source: If I get these items for you, will you make this oil?
String.Dest: 如果我帮你找到这些东西，你会做出这种油么？

String.Source: Aye. If you feel this cause is worthy, love, then I trust you. Besides, what smith wouldn't want to forge a legendary axe?
String.Dest: 当然。如果你觉得这是值得的，亲爱的，那我就相信你。而且，什么样的铁匠才不想去打造一把传奇斧子啊？

String.Source: If I get these items for you, will you make this oil?
String.Dest: 如果我帮你找到这些东西，你会做出这种油么？

String.Source: I've actually got everything I need, with the exception of one thing. I need a bit of Bloodgrass shipped from home. That's where the oil comes from.
String.Dest: 我已经得到了一切我需要的东西，除了一样儿。我还需要一些家乡运来的血草。那是个盛产油料的地方。

String.Source: If I get these items for you, will you make this oil?
String.Dest: 如果我帮你找到这些东西，你会做出这种油么？

String.Source: The problem is, the East Empire Company's been through a bit of a rough patch lately, and it's hard to get rare goods.
String.Dest: The problem is, the East Empire Company's been through a bit of a rough patch lately, and it's hard to get rare goods.

String.Source: If I get these items for you, will you make this oil?
String.Dest: 如果我帮你找到这些东西，你会做出这种油么？

String.Source: Maybe you can talk to my contact Cyrus over in Windhelm, and see if he can't get it shipped sooner.
String.Dest: 也许你应该到风盔城去找我的联系人塞勒斯，看看他能不能早点把它运来。

String.Source: If I get these items for you, will you make this oil?
String.Dest: 如果我帮你找到这些东西，你会做出这种油么？

String.Source: Aye, I'm considering it. It's always been my dream to forge great weapons like this.
String.Dest: 是的，我是在考虑。我一直想锻造这样的伟大武器。

String.Source: If I get these items for you, will you make this oil?
String.Dest: 如果我帮你找到这些东西，你会做出这种油么？

String.Source: I've actually got everything I need, with the exception of one thing. I need a bit of Bloodgrass shipped from home. That's where the oil comes from.
String.Dest: 我已经得到了一切我需要的东西，除了一样儿。我还需要一些家乡运来的血草。那是个盛产油料的地方。

String.Source: If I get these items for you, will you make this oil?
String.Dest: 如果我帮你找到这些东西，你会做出这种油么？

String.Source: The problem is, the East Empire Company's been through a bit of a rough patch lately, and it's hard to get rare goods.
String.Dest: The problem is, the East Empire Company's been through a bit of a rough patch lately, and it's hard to get rare goods.

String.Source: If I get these items for you, will you make this oil?
String.Dest: 如果我帮你找到这些东西，你会做出这种油么？

String.Source: Maybe you can talk to my contact Cyrus over in Windhelm, and see if he can't get it shipped sooner.
String.Dest: 也许你应该到风盔城去找我的联系人塞勒斯，看看他能不能早点把它运来。

String.Source: What's so special about the Star-Blood forge?
String.Dest: 这星血熔炉有什么特别之处？

String.Source: To explain that, I need to explain a bit about smithing. See, when you quench a blade, you can't just use water or brine.
String.Dest: 为了把它说清楚，我得向你说些锻造方面的事情。你看，当你在给一把刀淬火的时候，你不能只用水或者盐水。

String.Source: What's so special about the Star-Blood forge?
String.Dest: 这星血熔炉有什么特别之处？

String.Source: You need to add a bit of oil to keep the thin sections from cracking, because otherwise the steam will get between the water and the blade.
String.Dest: 你得在这个细小的零件上加点油以防其裂开，因为如果不那么做的话蒸汽就会从水和刀口之间冒出来了。

String.Source: What's so special about the Star-Blood forge?
String.Dest: 这星血熔炉有什么特别之处？

String.Source: That makes for an uneven quench. Of course, if your well is big enough, it'll make sure the liquid stays in contact regardless.
String.Dest: 虽然这并不能解燃眉之急，但如果你的泉眼足够大，不论如何它至少能保证水流不间断。

String.Source: What's so special about the Star-Blood forge?
String.Dest: 这星血熔炉有什么特别之处？

String.Source: But I'm guessing we'll only have so much blood to work with. In that case, we need to brew a special oil, one that doesn't contaminate the liquid.
String.Dest: 但是我猜我们只有这么多血液来工作了。这样的话，我们需要酿造一种特殊的油，一种不会污染这个液体的油。

String.Source: Let's just hope they aren't doing something foolish like ignoring me.
String.Dest: 希望他们别做蠢事，比如无视我的存在什么的……

String.Source: Aye, you would be a fool's fool to ignore the Dragonborn, or worse yet, make an enemy of her. I'm sure you'll hear from them soon enough.
String.Dest: 同意。如果你忽视龙裔的存在，那你就是个蠢蛋。或者更糟的，你与她为敌。我想你已经听过很多他们的事情了。

String.Source: Let's just hope they aren't doing something foolish like ignoring me.
String.Dest: 希望他们别做蠢事，比如无视我的存在什么的……

String.Source: When you do, you can tell them I'll do it. I'll forge the axe. And when it's done, no beast, dragon or otherwise, will be a match for its edge.
String.Dest: 当你这样做的时候，你可以告诉他们我会这样做的。我会锻造这把斧子的。当它完成时，就没有野兽、龙或其他东西能与斧子的锋利匹敌了。

String.Source: Let's just hope they aren't doing something foolish like ignoring me.
String.Dest: 希望他们别做蠢事，比如无视我的存在什么的……

String.Source: Aye, you would be a fool's fool to ignore the Dragonborn, or worse yet, make an enemy of him. I'm sure you'll hear from them soon enough.
String.Dest: 噢，你一定是个白痴才愚蠢到想要忽视龙裔，要是更作死的话就是与他为敌。我确定你很快就会从他们那里听到这个的。

String.Source: Let's just hope they aren't doing something foolish like ignoring me.
String.Dest: 希望他们别做蠢事，比如无视我的存在什么的……

String.Source: When you do, you can tell them I'll do it. I'll forge the axe. And when it's done, no beast, dragon or otherwise, will be a match for its edge.
String.Dest: 当你这样做的时候，你可以告诉他们我会这样做的。我会锻造这把斧子的。当它完成时，就没有野兽、龙或其他东西能与斧子的锋利匹敌了。

String.Source: Still no word. I'm beginning to worry about them.
String.Dest: 还是没有消息。我开始担心他们了。

String.Source: Aye love, it does seem odd the Nord would just disappear. Maybe you can follow some of your other leads, and find out what happened.
String.Dest: 是的亲爱的，那诺德人的突然消失确实非常奇怪。或许你可以跟随其他线索一起去找找看到底发生了什么。

String.Source: Still no word. I'm beginning to worry about them.
String.Dest: 还是没有消息。我开始担心他们了。

String.Source: When you do find him, tell him I'll do it. I'll forge the axe. And when it's done, no beast, dragon or otherwise, will be a match for its edge.
String.Dest: 你要是找到了他，告诉他我可以做。我会铸造那把斧头。等到完成的时候，世界上任何的野兽，恶龙还是什么都无法抵挡它的利刃！

String.Source: Still no word. I'm beginning to worry about them.
String.Dest: 还是没有消息。我开始担心他们了。

String.Source: It does seem odd the Nord would just disappear. Maybe you can follow some of your other leads, and find out what happened.
String.Dest: 那个诺德人就这么消失了，这看起来太奇怪了。也许你可以循着一些其他的线索，找出到底发生了什么事。

String.Source: Still no word. I'm beginning to worry about them.
String.Dest: 还是没有消息。我开始担心他们了。

String.Source: When you do find him, tell him I'll do it. I'll forge the axe. And when it's done, no beast, dragon or otherwise, will be a match for its edge.
String.Dest: 你要是找到了他，告诉他我可以做。我会铸造那把斧头。等到完成的时候，世界上任何的野兽，恶龙还是什么都无法抵挡它的利刃！

String.Source: Not yet, but I'm sure the courier will be arriving any day now.
String.Dest: 还没有，不过我确定那个信使这两天随时可能出现。

String.Source: All right. You can tell them I'll do it. I'll forge the axe. And when it's done, no beast, dragon or otherwise, will be a match for its edge.
String.Dest: All right. You can tell them I'll do it. I'll forge the axe. And when it's done, no beast, dragon or otherwise, will be a match for its edge.

String.Source: Good news. I got the bloodgrass.
String.Dest: 好消息，我拿到血草了。

String.Source: As I knew you would. I take it you would have run all the way to Kvatch to help your wife. Hopefully it was a little easier than that.
String.Dest: 就我所了解的你来说，你肯定会径直前往科瓦奇城去帮助你的妻子。但愿这为时未晚。

String.Source: Good news. I got the bloodgrass.
String.Dest: 好消息，我拿到血草了。

String.Source: I guess all that's left now is to forge this axe. Have you gotten word from your friends?
String.Dest: 我猜现在剩下的事儿就只有造把斧头了。你从你朋友那边得到信儿了吗？

String.Source: Good news. I got the bloodgrass.
String.Dest: 好消息，我拿到血草了。

String.Source: Being a true hero, I take it you would have run all the way to Kvatch if you had to. Hopefully it was a little easier than that.
String.Dest: 做个真英雄吧，我觉得在毫无选择的情况下你一定会排除万难抵达科瓦奇城。但愿这比那个简单一些。

String.Source: Good news. I got the bloodgrass.
String.Dest: 好消息，我拿到血草了。

String.Source: I guess all that's left now is to forge this axe. Have you gotten word from your friends?
String.Dest: 我猜现在剩下的事儿就只有造把斧头了。你从你朋友那边得到信儿了吗？

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: Not many people can find the place, to be honest, since it's not on any map.
String.Dest: 说实话，没多少人能找到这个地方。因为那里在任何一份地图上都没有标示。

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: The only reason the guard were able to arrest my father is because he was forced to spend the night in Solitude.
String.Dest: 守卫逮捕我父亲唯一可行的理由就是他非自愿而不得不在独孤城过了一夜。

String.Source: Well, pretty much any pairing will work that doesn't involve Skjarn.
String.Dest: 唉，几乎每对没有史卡盎捣乱的组合都很有成效。

String.Source: That's not exactly how it works. They're quenched in Daedric blood, but the weapons themselves are made here.
String.Dest: 确切地说不是那样。武器确实是用魔族血来冷却的，但打造那些武器的地点是在这儿。

String.Source: That's the cost of staying alive, Elf. Don't be cheap when it comes to that.
String.Dest: 那就是求生的代价，精灵。到这时你可别贪便宜。

String.Source: Rumarin, when are you going to give up those bound blades and wield a proper weapon?
String.Dest: 罗米勒，你什么时候才能把那些召唤武器放下改拿一把正常的武器呢？

String.Source: No thank you. I craft my own weapons and armor.
String.Dest: 不了谢谢。我的武器盔甲都是自己打的。

String.Source: An adventurer and a blacksmith, huh. You and I are a lot alike. I'm actually on a pilgrimage of sorts.
String.Dest: 一个冒险家和铁匠，哼嗯。你和我很相似。我实际上勉强称得上是在进行朝圣之旅。

String.Source: No thank you. I craft my own weapons and armor.
String.Dest: 不了谢谢。我的武器盔甲都是自己打的。

String.Source: I originally wanted to work under Eorlund Gray-Mane, but I found Adrianne Avenicci to be just as talented a teacher.
String.Dest: 我本来想在厄仑德．灰鬃的指导下工作，但我发现阿德里安娜同样是个有才能的老师。

String.Source: No thank you. I craft my own weapons and armor.
String.Dest: 不了谢谢。我的武器盔甲都是自己打的。

String.Source: In Solitude, I had the pleasure of learning under Beirand, and the displeasure of meeting his wife.
String.Dest: 在独孤城，我很荣幸能在贝尔兰德门下学习技艺，但我很讨厌见到他的妻子。

String.Source: No thank you. I craft my own weapons and armor.
String.Dest: 不了谢谢。我的武器盔甲都是自己打的。

String.Source: Now I work for Lod, but someday I'll have to return to Cyrodiil, and work for myself. You see, someone has to inherit the family forge.
String.Dest: 现在我是为罗德打工，可是总有一天我得回到赛瑞迪尔, 自己做老板。要知道，有的人不得不继承家族的熔炉啊。

String.Source: The Thalmor are good people. Just misunderstood.
String.Dest: 梭默都是善良的人，只是误解。

String.Source: They want to enslave mankind because they think we're inferior.
String.Dest: 他们想奴役人类，因为他们认为我们是低等的存在。

String.Source: The Thalmor are good people. Just misunderstood.
String.Dest: 梭默都是善良的人，只是误解。

String.Source: You know I love you, but you're going to have to change your politics if you want this to work.
String.Dest: 你也知道我爱你，但如果你想接下这个工作的话，必须改变你的政治立场。

String.Source: The Thalmor are good people. Just misunderstood.
String.Dest: 梭默都是善良的人，只是误解。

String.Source: I just hope if you have family, they don't feel the same. Otherwise they won't ever be meeting mine.
String.Dest: 我只是希望，如果你有家人的话，他们不会有同样的感觉。另一方面，他们也永远不可能遇到我。

String.Source: It's actually quite tedious. Sort of like this conversation.
String.Dest: 事实上这相当乏味。很少有人喜欢这种转变。

String.Source: I...I didn't mean to waste your time, traveler. I can be a bit of a barnacle when an adventurer is around. I won't be any more of a bother.
String.Dest: 我不是故意要浪费你时间的，旅行者。只是每当附近有冒险家的时候我都会忍不住上前纠缠一番。我不会再多打扰你了。

String.Source: They say he committed atrocities long before he found The Way of the Voice.
String.Dest: 据说参悟吼声之道不久后他就犯下累累暴行。

String.Source: As the Dragonborn, the savior of Skyrim, you would know the answer better than I.
String.Dest: 龙裔, 天际省的救世主,你比我更知道答案。

String.Source: They say he committed atrocities long before he found The Way of the Voice.
String.Dest: 据说参悟吼声之道不久后他就犯下累累暴行。

String.Source: But I will say this: I've never been too forgiving of criminals. Mercy, I believe in, but not so much in redemption.
String.Dest: 但我要说：我从不会宽恕罪犯。我相信怜悯，但保释并不在其中。

String.Source: They say he committed atrocities long before he found The Way of the Voice.
String.Dest: 据说参悟吼声之道不久后他就犯下累累暴行。

String.Source: If this dragon has committed crimes, I say he should answer for them. But I leave that decision up to you. Whatever you decide, I shall be with you.
String.Dest: 如果这头龙确实犯下了罪行，那他当然得做出解释。不过我将选择权留给你。无论你的决定是如何，我都会听从你的。

String.Source: I'm an orphan. You're the only family I've got. And the only one I need.
String.Dest: 我是个孤儿。你是我唯一的家人。也是我唯一需要的人。

String.Source: You mean everything to me as well. I think my family's pretty mad at me for marrying you instead of inheriting the forge, but I don't care.
String.Dest: 你对我而言也是重于一切啊。虽然我的家人可能因为我嫁了你却没继承锻炉而生气，可我不在乎。

String.Source: I'm an orphan. You're the only family I've got. And the only one I need.
String.Dest: 我是个孤儿。你是我唯一的家人。也是我唯一需要的人。

String.Source: In this world, we only need each other. And I promise I'll never put anything else before what we have.
String.Dest: In this world, we only need each other. And I promise I'll never put anything else before what we have.

String.Source: I don't associate with those tyrants.
String.Dest: 我不和那些暴君来往。

String.Source: That's good to hear, although obvious, considering you married an Imperial. Hopefully your family feels the same. If you have one, that is.
String.Dest: 听到你那样说真高兴，不过好像你是嫁给了一个帝国人吧。但愿你的家人也能这样想，哦没错，说的就是你的那位帝国人。

String.Source: Oh, it's nothing. Forget I said anything.
String.Dest: 噢，没事儿，我啥也没说。

String.Source: Alright. Already forgotten.
String.Dest: 是啊。早就忘记了。

String.Source: I know what you're talking about, but my village was stationary.
String.Dest: 我知道你想说什么，可是我的村庄是很久之前就在这里了。

String.Source: Aye, and I'm sure those cities aren't running around the countryside like a headless chicken. That would just make you dizzy.
String.Dest: 唉，不过我可以肯定的是，那些村落不会像无头苍蝇一样在郊外乱晃。这可能让你有点晕菜了吧。

String.Source: I know what you're talking about, but my village was stationary.
String.Dest: 我知道你想说什么，可是我的村庄是很久之前就在这里了。

String.Source: But it'd still be really hard to forge if everything was shifting under your feet. It's enough to make a girl learn magic.
String.Dest: 当一切在你眼前一闪而过时这还是很难啊。不过这对一个学魔法的女孩足够了。

String.Source: I know what you're talking about, but my village was stationary.
String.Dest: 我知道你想说什么，可是我的村庄是很久之前就在这里了。

String.Source: But anyhow, do you have family back in Valenwood? Any brothers or sisters?
String.Dest: 不过不管怎样， 你在威木省有家人吗？ 有兄弟姐妹吗?

String.Source: You laugh, but Lod deserves better than a malnourished hag like you.
String.Dest: 你就笑吧你，但是你这发育不健全的巫婆绝对配不上罗德。

String.Source: Are you serious? That was uncalled for. This conversation's over.
String.Dest: 你没在开玩笑吧？这根本没道理。好了，不谈了。

String.Source: What happens if you don't inherit it?
String.Dest: 如果你不继承它会发生什么?

String.Source: The responsibility of the forge would likely go to the next daughter in line, my sister, Felicia. A fine choice.
String.Dest: The responsibility of the forge would likely go to the next daughter in line, my sister, Felicia. A fine choice.

String.Source: What happens if you don't inherit it?
String.Dest: 如果你不继承它会发生什么?

String.Source: She's always been the more creative smith. Diamond encrusted pommels, hilts that shimmered like drake scales...everything she made was beautiful.
String.Dest: 她一直是最富创造性的铁匠。钻石镶嵌在剑柄上，如龙鳞般闪着淡淡的光芒…她的作品总是那么美丽。

String.Source: What happens if you don't inherit it?
String.Dest: 如果你不继承它会发生什么?

String.Source: And it wouldn't matter that the blades couldn't cut warm butter. Nobody would ever use them for battle.
String.Dest: 就算那些刀刃钝的连热黄油都切不开也没关系。没人会舍得拿它们去作战。

String.Source: What do you have for sale?
String.Dest: 你有卖什么？

String.Source: Oh, lots of things. Take a look.
String.Dest: 哦，我这儿有很多东西呢。看看吧。

String.Source: What do you have for sale?
String.Dest: 你有卖什么？

String.Source: Blades, gauntlets, I can forge anything you need.
String.Dest: 剑，护手。你想要什么我都可以给你打造出来。

String.Source: What do you have for sale?
String.Dest: 你有卖什么？

String.Source: Blades, helmets...pretty much anything that suits your needs.
String.Dest: Blades, helmets...pretty much anything that suits your needs.

String.Source: What do you have for sale?
String.Dest: 你有卖什么？

String.Source: What can I do for you?
String.Dest: 有什么可以效劳的？

String.Source: What do you have for sale?
String.Dest: 你有卖什么？

String.Source: Looking to protect yourself, or deal some damage?
String.Dest: 在找保护自己的东西，还是砍人的东西？

String.Source: What do you have for sale?
String.Dest: 你有卖什么？

String.Source: Take a look.
String.Dest: 随意看看。

String.Source: What do you have for sale?
String.Dest: 你有卖什么？

String.Source: How can I help you?
String.Dest: 有什么我能效劳的？

String.Source: The deserts of Hammerfell.
String.Dest: 落锤省的沙漠。

String.Source: I met a couple of Redguard from Hammerfell once. I couldn't help but ask them about their swords.
String.Dest: 曾经我遇到过一对来自落锤省的红卫人 ，我忍不住问了关于他们的剑的问题。

String.Source: The deserts of Hammerfell.
String.Dest: 落锤省的沙漠。

String.Source: Never fashioned a curved sword before. I love our home, but maybe we ought to head over to Hammerfell someday for a season.
String.Dest: 之前我从未见过弧形剑。我热爱我的家园，但是未来某个时间我也许会去落锤省。

String.Source: Okay. Tell me about yourself.
String.Dest: 好的，把你的事告诉我吧。

String.Source: I'd say my first love was the Hero of Kvatch, but that doesn't really count. You can't really love a dead person.
String.Dest: 我想说我的初恋是科瓦奇城的英雄, 但那次当不得真. 你不能真的爱上一个死人.

String.Source: Okay. Tell me about yourself.
String.Dest: 好的，把你的事告诉我吧。

String.Source: I guess I never really loved anyone other than you. Even my first kiss was devoid of all romance.
String.Dest: 我想我从来没有真正爱过除你之外的任何人。即使是我的初吻也没有一丝浪漫。

String.Source: Okay. Tell me about yourself.
String.Dest: 好的，把你的事告诉我吧。

String.Source: There was this girl who really liked my brother, Larias, and he fancied her as well. But she was nervous about having to kiss him.
String.Dest: 这女孩爱我兄弟拉瑞亚斯爱得深沉，而我兄弟也挺心仪她。不过她在要跟他亲嘴这事儿上还有点“羞射”。

String.Source: Okay. Tell me about yourself.
String.Dest: 好的，把你的事告诉我吧。

String.Source: She thought she wouldn't be any good at it. So, helpful person that I was, I decided to let her practice on me.
String.Dest: 她认为没有谁能比她更深谙于此。于是，本着乐于助人的原则，我决定让她在我身上练习。

String.Source: Okay. Tell me about yourself.
String.Dest: 好的，把你的事告诉我吧。

String.Source: It would've been a great help too, if my brother didn't catch us during one of our practice sessions. I think he's still dealing with the scars.
String.Dest: 如果我哥哥没有在我们的那次练习中抓住我们的话，它本应该也能起到很大的帮助的。我想他至今还在处理那次的伤痕。

String.Source: Okay. Tell me about yourself.
String.Dest: 好的，把你的事告诉我吧。

String.Source: What about you? Who was your first?
String.Dest: 那你呢？等等你到底是谁来着？

String.Source: Now that we're married, we ought to get to know each other better.
String.Dest: 既然已经结为夫妻，我们应该互相了解多一点吧。

String.Source: I agree. I hear all about your adventures from the locals, but not about your past.
String.Dest: 我同意。我从传言中听到的都是你的冒险经历，而不是你的过去。

String.Source: Now that we're married, we ought to get to know each other better.
String.Dest: 既然已经结为夫妻，我们应该互相了解多一点吧。

String.Source: For instance, your favorite book, or something heavy, like your first love. I'll go first.
String.Dest: 例如，你喜欢的书，或者有分量的东西，就像你的初恋。我就先开始了。

String.Source: A bow. To pierce a heart as you have mine.
String.Dest: 一张爱之弓，在你我彼此相恋之时刺穿了我们的心。

String.Source: This bow is my finest work. In it is everything I am. Take it with you, my love, and let its aim be as true as our bond.
String.Dest: 这把弓是我最好的杰作，里面倾注了我全部的心血。带上它，亲爱的。愿它的准星如我们的束缚一样真诚、永恒。

String.Source: Cyrodiil, like yourself, my love.
String.Dest: 赛伦迪尔, 亲爱的，要热爱自己。

String.Source: Seriously? You're not from Kvatch, are you? I would remember someone like you. After all, when we met in Falkreath, it was love at first sight.
String.Dest: 说真的？你不是从科瓦奇城来的，对不？我会记得你这样的人的。毕竟，我们在佛克瑞斯见面时，那是一见钟情。

String.Source: I slew a dragon and took its soul. They say I'm the Dragonborn.
String.Dest: 因为我杀死了一头龙并且吸收了他的灵魂，所以他们说我是龙裔。

String.Source: The legends are true then...By Akatosh! You're the Dragonborn! And I'm your wife! Your blacksmith!
String.Dest: 那传说是真的……阿卡托什啊! 你是龙裔！而我是你的妻子！你的铁匠！

String.Source: I slew a dragon and took its soul. They say I'm the Dragonborn.
String.Dest: 因为我杀死了一头龙并且吸收了他的灵魂，所以他们说我是龙裔。

String.Source: It's as if every dream I had as a child wasn't just some idle fantasy....but part of some larger prophecy. My...I think I need to sit down.
String.Dest: 就好像我还是个孩子时拥有的每一个梦都不是些漫无边际的幻想……而是某种大型预言的一部分。我了个……我想我得坐一会儿。

String.Source: I met the Greybeards. They want me to retrieve the Horn of Jurgen Windcaller.
String.Dest: 我见过灰胡子了。他们想让我取回唤风者约根的号角。

String.Source: What were they like? Were they as wise as the legends say? What did they look like? Wouldn't it be funny if they didn't have beards?
String.Dest: 他们是什么样子的？他们像传说中那样聪明吗？它们看起来像什么？如果他们没有长胡子，那岂不是很有趣？

String.Source: I met the Greybeards. They want me to retrieve the Horn of Jurgen Windcaller.
String.Dest: 我见过灰胡子了。他们想让我取回唤风者约根的号角。

String.Source: I wish I could've been there in person, walking up the 7,000 steps, seeing Skyrim from the Throat of the World.
String.Dest: 真希望我能亲自去那儿，爬上7000层台阶，然后在世界之喉俯瞰整个天际省。

String.Source: I met the Greybeards. They want me to retrieve the Horn of Jurgen Windcaller.
String.Dest: 我见过灰胡子了。他们想让我取回唤风者约根的号角。

String.Source: The blades I forge may hold my spirit, and my love, but they don't have my eyes.
String.Dest: 我所锻造的武器注入了我的灵魂，和我的爱,但是他们却没有我的眼睛。

String.Source: Apparently the Blades aren't extinct. The innkeeper in Riverwood was one.
String.Dest: 表面上刀锋会并不存在，但是溪木镇的旅馆就是一个据点。

String.Source: That's wonderful news! My mother told me stories of how the Blades guided Martin Septim toward his destiny as Emperor.
String.Dest: 那真是个好消息！我母亲跟讲过刀锋战士如何引导马丁·塞普丁迈向成为一个君王的命运。

String.Source: Apparently the Blades aren't extinct. The innkeeper in Riverwood was one.
String.Dest: 表面上刀锋会并不存在，但是溪木镇的旅馆就是一个据点。

String.Source: They're an honorable lot, and they have an impressive armory, if I recall correctly. I'd love to get my hands on some Akaviri craftsmanship.
String.Dest: 他们是一群可敬的人，要是我记的没错，他们有个让人印象深刻的兵器库。我真想去亲手摸摸那些阿卡维尔工匠的手艺。

String.Source: Apparently the Blades aren't extinct. The innkeeper in Riverwood was one.
String.Dest: 表面上刀锋会并不存在，但是溪木镇的旅馆就是一个据点。

String.Source: I wouldn't know what to do with it, but it'd be nice to have around the house as a conversation piece.
String.Dest: 我也不打算知道他们做什么，不过要是在这房子附近聊聊天的话还是不错的。

String.Source: I met a talking dragon named Paarthurnax.
String.Dest: 我遇见了一条会说话的龙，名字叫帕图纳克斯。

String.Source: And...it didn't attack you? That's crazy. And the Greybeards knew about this all this time? How do we know it isn't helping Alduin?
String.Dest: 而它……没有咬你？这太扯了。那些灰胡子也一直都知道？我们怎么知道它不是在帮助奥杜因呢？

String.Source: I met a talking dragon named Paarthurnax.
String.Dest: 我遇见了一条会说话的龙，名字叫帕图纳克斯。

String.Source: I trust your judgment, but I trust dragons about as far as I can throw them.
String.Dest: 我相信你的判断，但要想让我信任一条龙，除非我能把它抛起来。

String.Source: I found a way to vanquish Alduin, but he escaped to Sovngarde.
String.Dest: 我找到了击败奥杜因的方法，但是他逃到了松加德。

String.Source: Sovngarde? Where the Nords keep their heroes? I don't like this at all. What hope is left for mortals if even the dead can't have peace?
String.Dest: 松加德？诺德人英灵所在的地方？我可一点儿也不喜欢。如果连死者都无法得到安宁的话，那对于凡人来说也太过于绝望了吧？

String.Source: I found a way to vanquish Alduin, but he escaped to Sovngarde.
String.Dest: 我找到了击败奥杜因的方法，但是他逃到了松加德。

String.Source: You must hurry my love. And if you must die to reach to Sovngarde, then I will gladly die with you.
String.Dest: 你必须快点儿，吾爱。但如果你必须到松加德去，那么我很乐意和你一起死。

String.Source: You'd like it in Hammerfell. Why not spend a year or two there?
String.Dest: 你喜欢落锤。为啥不在那儿呆个一两年呢？

String.Source: Or 3, or 4, or maybe the rest of our lives. I'm starting to miss living in a warmer climate, although I'm not ready to see my disapproving mother.
String.Dest: 或者3，或者4，或许是我们剩下的时光. 我开始想念在温暖气候下的生活了, 尽管我还没准备好去见我那恼人的老妈.

String.Source: You'd like it in Hammerfell. Why not spend a year or two there?
String.Dest: 你喜欢落锤。为啥不在那儿呆个一两年呢？

String.Source: What about you, do you have family back home? Any brothers or sisters?
String.Dest: 你呢？你有家人回来么？兄弟或者姐妹？

String.Source: My wife, I come from a land to the west known as the Summerset Isle.
String.Dest: 我的妻子和我是从西边那片被叫做夏暮省的土地来的。

String.Source: Don't tell my parents that. Mention the word "Thalmor" and my father will get a case of the rattles. So will you, when he's strangling your neck.
String.Dest: 不要告诉我的父母。一提"梭默"这个词我老爹就会把你的脖子掐得咯咯作响。

String.Source: My wife, I come from a land to the west known as the Summerset Isle.
String.Dest: 我的妻子和我是从西边那片被叫做夏暮省的土地来的。

String.Source: Still, there's a lot of High Elves that are against the Aldmeri Dominion. I'm sure you don't approve of them either, my love.
String.Dest: 不过，也有很多高等精灵是反对先祖神州的。你肯定也不会赞同他们吧，亲爱的。

String.Source: It was a young love. Meant nothing.
String.Dest: 这除了幼稚的爱情以外什么都不是。

String.Source: Still, it makes me jealous that she stole my love's first kiss. (Sigh) If only we met sooner. How many years did we lose trying to find each other?
String.Dest: 然而，我仍免不了因为她偷走了我爱人的初吻而妒火中烧。 (叹气) 相见恨晚啊。在我们寻找彼此时，多少岁月匆匆流逝？

String.Source: It was a young love. Meant nothing.
String.Dest: 这除了幼稚的爱情以外什么都不是。

String.Source: But I don't want to sound ungrateful. I consider myself pretty lucky to have you.
String.Dest: 但是我不想听上去忘恩负义。我能拥有你是多么幸运啊。

String.Source: It was a young love. Meant nothing.
String.Dest: 这除了幼稚的爱情以外什么都不是。

String.Source: I enjoyed this talk. We should definitely have more, as long as it doesn't take away from your duties.
String.Dest: 我喜欢这么聊天儿。我们应该多聊一会儿，只要这不会让你擅离职守。

String.Source: A pendant. One that sparkles with the light of your eyes.
String.Dest: 一个挂坠.。一个能使你双眼发光的挂坠。

String.Source: I knew you had no need for a weapon. So I made a more personal gift. A pendant that you can wear around your neck, and over your heart.
String.Dest: 我知道你没有需要的武器。所以我做了一个更私人的礼物。一个吊坠,你可以戴在你的脖子上,并将它放在你心上。

String.Source: High Rock. The province to the west of here.
String.Dest: 高岩省。与天际省西部毗邻的行省。

String.Source: I confess, my love, I don't know too much about the Breton kingdoms. I mean, they're not like the Forsworn, are they? Worshipping old magic?
String.Dest: 我承认，我的爱人，我对布莱顿人的王国知之甚少。我指，他们不会像弃逝者那样，对吧？崇拜那些古老的魔法？

String.Source: So I have this friend...He's trapped in a miserable marriage and wants out.
String.Dest: 所以我有这样的一个朋友……他被困在悲惨的婚姻里想出来.

String.Source: Sounds like a coward to me. I don't know why your friends don't try to be more like you. A champion never retreats when times are tough.
String.Dest: 听起来是个懦夫啊。我真不明白你的朋友怎么不多跟你学学。勇敢者面对困境从不退缩才对。

String.Source: So I have this friend...She's trapped in a miserable marriage and wants out.
String.Dest: 我有这样一位朋友……她陷入了悲惨的婚姻并且想逃离出去。

String.Source: Sounds like a coward to me. I don't know why your friends don't try to be more like you. A champion never retreats when times are tough.
String.Dest: 听起来是个懦夫啊。我真不明白你的朋友怎么不多跟你学学。勇敢者面对困境从不退缩才对。

String.Source: A shield. So that you will keep me safe, as I do the world.
String.Dest: 一个盾牌。所以你会保证我的安全，就像我保卫这一切一样。

String.Source: With this shield, I will stand beside you and deflect every arrow, parry every blow. In this shield I have placed my prayers for your safe return.
String.Dest: 有了这个盾牌, 我会站在你身边，挡住每一个射来的箭头，做好每一次格挡。我会祝福你平安归来。

String.Source: There are people who want the Emperor dead. They want me to kill him.
String.Dest: 有人想要皇帝的命，他们要我去行刺他。

String.Source: And did you tell them that the Savior of Skyrim does not assassinate rulers? Tyrants, maybe, but I don't think Titus Mede the Second qualifies.
String.Dest: 那你有没有告诉他们天际的救世主没有暗杀皇帝？暴君，也许吧，但我认为提图斯迈德二世算不上一名暴君。

String.Source: There are people who want the Emperor dead. They want me to kill him.
String.Dest: 有人想要皇帝的命，他们要我去行刺他。

String.Source: It's as if some people don't know what a hero is. Unbelievable.
String.Dest: 这就好像人们不知道英雄是啥一样。难以置信。

String.Source: Gleda of Rorikstead. She's a goat.
String.Dest: 洛克利镇的格雷迪亚。她是一只山羊。

String.Source: (Laughs) You're too funny, my love. I'm sure you were Gleda's first as well. First person, anyhow.
String.Dest: (笑声) 你太有趣了,我的甜心。我相信你是格丽达的第一个人。总之是第一个。

String.Source: Gleda of Rorikstead. She's a goat.
String.Dest: 洛克利镇的格雷迪亚。她是一只山羊。

String.Source: I enjoyed this talk. We should definitely have more, as long as it doesn't take away from your duties.
String.Dest: 我喜欢这么聊天儿。我们应该多聊一会儿，只要这不会让你擅离职守。

String.Source: Sometimes I get exhausted from adventuring. It's so repetitive.
String.Dest: 冒险总是让我精疲力竭，因为它真的很单调。

String.Source: But you aren't just an adventurer, my love. You're the Dragonborn. You must do what is right.
String.Dest: 但你不只是冒险者，吾爱。你是龙裔。你得做正确之事。

String.Source: Sometimes I get exhausted from adventuring. It's so repetitive.
String.Dest: 冒险总是让我精疲力竭，因为它真的很单调。

String.Source: Think about it this way. Ever time you slay a bandit, it's another person who won't get robbed on the road, or kidnapped and held ransom.
String.Dest: 这么说吧。每当你杀掉了一个强盗，就会改变另一个人在半路上惨遭抢劫，或是被绑架勒索的命运。

String.Source: Sometimes I get exhausted from adventuring. It's so repetitive.
String.Dest: 冒险总是让我精疲力竭，因为它真的很单调。

String.Source: That's what I do when I forge. I've made the same steel sword a thousand times over, but every time it's different, because of who it's for.
String.Dest: 这就是当我锻造时我会做的事。我已经成千次地打造了同一款剑，但是每次是不同的，因为我给的人是不同的。

String.Source: Sometimes I get exhausted from adventuring. It's so repetitive.
String.Dest: 冒险总是让我精疲力竭，因为它真的很单调。

String.Source: You think of the people you're doing this for, and it becomes less about killing nameless beasts and bandits, than about the good folks you love.
String.Dest: 你想起了使你做这件事的人们，但随着杀了无数的野兽与强盗，你慢慢遗忘了他们，最后甚至是你所爱的人们。

String.Source: Sometimes I get exhausted from adventuring. It's so repetitive.
String.Dest: 冒险总是让我精疲力竭，因为它真的很单调。

String.Source: And if you don't care about those people, then think about your wife, and do it for me.
String.Dest: 就算你不在乎那些人的话，想想你的妻子，就帮我这次吧。

String.Source: There was this blacksmith. We got married, and I kissed her.
String.Dest: 就这个铁匠。我们结婚了，我吻了她。

String.Source: That's sweet of you to say, my love. I didn't realize you were so inexperienced. But I always knew you were pure.
String.Dest: 你温柔的说，我的宝贝，我没有想到你是如此的缺乏经验，但是我一直都知道你是纯洁的。

String.Source: There was this blacksmith. We got married, and I kissed her.
String.Dest: 就这个铁匠。我们结婚了，我吻了她。

String.Source: I enjoyed this talk. We should definitely have more, as long as it doesn't take away from your duties.
String.Dest: 我喜欢这么聊天儿。我们应该多聊一会儿，只要这不会让你擅离职守。

String.Source: I come from Morrowind.
String.Dest: 我从晨风来。

String.Source: How are things over there? I didn't meet too many Dunmer in Falkreath. Most cross the border near Windhelm.
String.Dest: 这儿的日子好过吗？我在佛克瑞斯还真没见过几个暗精灵。他们大多跑去风舵城边境了。

String.Source: Oh, hello there. What can I do for you? Blades, gauntlets, I can forge anything you need.
String.Dest: 哦，你好，欢迎光临。我能帮您做什么吗？武器，护甲，我能为您锻造您想要的。

String.Source: Elsweyr. As in the province.
String.Dest: 在艾斯维尔省。

String.Source: You're a long way from home, my love. In more ways then one. You won't find any deserts in this part of Tamriel.
String.Dest: 要回到故乡你还有好长一段路要走，亲爱的。比你以往走过的路都要长。你在泰姆瑞尔大陆的这块区域里是找不到任何沙漠的。

String.Source: Elsweyr. As in the province.
String.Dest: 在艾斯维尔省。

String.Source: Is it true that the Khajiit warriors there don't wear any armor? It'd be a poor place for a blacksmith to make a living.
String.Dest: 听说虎人战士们不穿盔甲，是真的吗？那想必铁匠在那里会过得很辛苦。

String.Source: You look a little young to be a blacksmith.
String.Dest: 对于铁匠这个职业，你看起来有点年轻。

String.Source: I'm Lod's apprentice. Although I've been his for less than a season.
String.Dest: 我是罗德的学徒。不过我作他学徒的时间还不到一个季度。

String.Source: You look a little young to be a blacksmith.
String.Dest: 对于铁匠这个职业，你看起来有点年轻。

String.Source: Before that I was with Adrianne Avenicci in Whiterun. And before that, Beirand in Solitude.
String.Dest: 在此之前我曾与战争少女于白漫城共识。在白漫城之前, 我在独孤城的铁匠铺。

String.Source: You look a little young to be a blacksmith.
String.Dest: 对于铁匠这个职业，你看起来有点年轻。

String.Source: I'm on a sort of pilgrimage you see. When I'm finished, my family expects me to return to Cyrodiil and take over the forge.
String.Dest: 如你所见，我在朝圣之旅的路上。当我完成的时候，我的家人希望我能回赛瑞迪尔并接管那家铁匠铺。

String.Source: You look a little young to be a blacksmith.
String.Dest: 对于铁匠这个职业，你看起来有点年轻。

String.Source: My name's Isobel, by the way. Pleased to meet you.
String.Dest: 顺便一提，我的名字是伊莎贝尔。很高兴认识你。

String.Source: You don't sound all that enthusiastic about inheriting the forge.
String.Dest: 你听起来不那么热衷继承锻造。

String.Source: I know, I know. Some people think it's the pressure, or the burden of carrying on the family name.
String.Dest: 我懂，我懂。有些人觉得门第观念本身就是一种压力，或者负担。

String.Source: You don't sound all that enthusiastic about inheriting the forge.
String.Dest: 你听起来不那么热衷继承锻造。

String.Source: But the truth is, it's the clients. It's not like the Skyforge here. If I took over the family business, I would be crafting swords for nobles.
String.Dest: 但真实情况是，我的客户群体会发生变化。我的铁匠铺并不像这里的天空熔炉一样，一旦我接管了家族生意，那我就只能为贵族们打造武器了。

String.Source: You don't sound all that enthusiastic about inheriting the forge.
String.Dest: 你听起来不那么热衷继承锻造。

String.Source: They would be decorative art pieces, locked away in display cases or mounted over their beds.
String.Dest: 它们将会以艺术作品来修饰，之后锁在展览盒内或者装在他们的床上面。

String.Source: You don't sound all that enthusiastic about inheriting the forge.
String.Dest: 你听起来不那么热衷继承锻造。

String.Source: I would be an artist more than a blacksmith. There'd be no blood on my blades, and no chinks in my armor.
String.Dest: 我会变成一个艺术家，而不是一名铁匠。我铸的刀刃将不能痛饮热血，我做的盔甲将没有累累战痕。

String.Source: You don't sound all that enthusiastic about inheriting the forge.
String.Dest: 你听起来不那么热衷继承锻造。

String.Source: That's not what I want. I want to craft weapons for heroes. I want to forge weapons that will slay tyrants, and craft armor that repels dragonfire.
String.Dest: 这不是我想要的结果。我希望为英雄们铸造武器。我希望我铸造的武器能弑杀暴君，而我打造的铠甲能抵御龙火。

String.Source: As a matter of fact, yes.
String.Dest: 就事实来说，是的。

String.Source: My, that must be strange. I think I'd go mad if I saw the sun rise and set from the same location. That has to happen every now and then.
String.Dest: 天，那可就太奇怪了。我要是看到太阳从同一个地方升起和落下一定会发疯。而这却是时不时的就发生一次。

String.Source: As a matter of fact, yes.
String.Dest: 就事实来说，是的。

String.Source: And you must have a calendar that charts the movements. Given how everything changes, it's a good thing Bosmer don't grow vegetables.
String.Dest: 你应该有一个日程表吧，用来记录每一步的那种。时过境迁，木精灵终于不再种蔬菜了这是件好事呢。

String.Source: As a matter of fact, yes.
String.Dest: 就事实来说，是的。

String.Source: But anyhow, do you have family back in Valenwood? Any brothers or sisters?
String.Dest: 不过不管怎样， 你在威木省有家人吗？ 有兄弟姐妹吗?

String.Source: I snore like a mammoth.
String.Dest: 我打呼鲁时活像一只长毛象。

String.Source: You scared me! I thought you were going to say you killed a Jarl or something.
String.Dest: 你吓死我了！我还以为你会说你杀了一个领主什么的。

String.Source: I snore like a mammoth.
String.Dest: 我打呼鲁时活像一只长毛象。

String.Source: You do realize we share a bed, right? Your nighttime habits aren't exactly a secret, you know.
String.Dest: 你明白我们共用一张床对吧？你睡觉时的那些小动作对我来说可不是秘密。

String.Source: This forge is possessed by your ancestor?
String.Dest: 这个熔炉被你的先祖附体了?

String.Source: (Laughs) I probably shouldn't have used the word "haunted." It's not like that at all. She's more of a guardian spirit.
String.Dest: (笑声)我也许不该用“闹鬼”这个词儿。根本不是那么回事。她更像是一个守护神。

String.Source: This forge is possessed by your ancestor?
String.Dest: 这个熔炉被你的先祖附体了?

String.Source: When it comes time for me to inherit the forge, there's a ritual. A test, actually.
String.Dest: 当时候到了我要继承熔炉的时候，会有一个仪式，准确来说，是一个考验。

String.Source: What sort of ritual do you have undergo?
String.Dest: 你在进行一个怎样的仪式？

String.Source: This forge is possessed by your ancestor?
String.Dest: 这个熔炉被你的先祖附体了?

String.Source: Like my mother before me, and my grandmother before her, I must craft an object that best represents my ideals and spirit.
String.Dest: 就像我在我之前的母亲，以及在她之前的祖母一样，我必须要创造一个能最好的反映出我理想和精神的对象。

String.Source: What happens if you craft this item?
String.Dest: 你做好这件东西会怎么样？

String.Source: This forge is possessed by your ancestor?
String.Dest: 这个熔炉被你的先祖附体了?

String.Source: If the object is deemed worthy, it will earn its place in the underforge, alongside the blades, shields, and hammers of my ancestors.
String.Dest: 如果这东西名副其实，它就可以在地下熔炉获得一席之位，列于我先祖的剑盾锤边上。

String.Source: What happens if you craft this item?
String.Dest: 你做好这件东西会怎么样？

String.Source: This forge is possessed by your ancestor?
String.Dest: 这个熔炉被你的先祖附体了?

String.Source: That's sort of what this pilgrimage is about. I'm here not just to learn from the masters, but to learn about myself.
String.Dest: 这就是朝圣之路。我来这儿不仅仅是想从大师们那儿学到一些东西，更是想对自己进行进一步挖掘。

String.Source: What happens if you craft this item?
String.Dest: 你做好这件东西会怎么样？

String.Source: This forge is possessed by your ancestor?
String.Dest: 这个熔炉被你的先祖附体了?

String.Source: At least, that's what I told my mother. The truth is, I chose Skyrim because of the war, and the chance to forge for true warriors.
String.Dest: 至少我对我母亲就是那样说的。真相是，我选择天际的原因是因为天际正处于战火之中，这可是个为真的勇士锻造的好机会。

String.Source: Yeah, I was born and raised in the city. It would fit anywhere in Cyrodiil.
String.Dest: 是的，我在这城市里出生，长大。这个针对赛瑞迪尔的任何一处也适用。

String.Source: Isn't that strange how things works out? Although I'm sure it's a lot different that Kvatch.
String.Dest: 事情了结得很奇怪对吧? 尽管我确定跟科瓦奇城有点不一样.

String.Source: Yeah, I was born and raised in the city. It would fit anywhere in Cyrodiil.
String.Dest: 是的，我在这城市里出生，长大。这个针对赛瑞迪尔的任何一处也适用。

String.Source: I mean, Markarth is a Dwarven ruin, but the Nords there still drink mead and scratch their bellies just like everywhere else.
String.Dest: 我的意思是， 马卡斯城是一个矮人废墟，但这儿的诺德人仍然把蜂蜜酒灌进他们的肚子里，就像他们在其他地方所做的一样丝毫不在乎这里的巨大威胁。

String.Source: Yeah, I was born and raised in the city. It would fit anywhere in Cyrodiil.
String.Dest: 是的，我在这城市里出生，长大。这个针对赛瑞迪尔的任何一处也适用。

String.Source: But anyhow, do you have family back in Black Marsh? Any brothers or sisters?
String.Dest: 总之你在黑沼泽省有亲人吗？有没有兄弟姐妹？

String.Source: I prefer to have a man's steel, if you know what I mean.
String.Dest: 我更喜欢男式武器，如果你知道我指的是什么。

String.Source: (Laughs) Fair enough. Perhaps you ought to talk to Lod then. Although I doubt he has much to say, beyond the color of Dengeir's britches.
String.Dest: (笑声) 很公平。你应该找罗德谈谈。虽然我在怀疑他有很多想说的，不止是讨论丁格尔那只裤子。

String.Source: I prefer to have a man's steel, if you know what I mean.
String.Dest: 我更喜欢男式武器，如果你知道我指的是什么。

String.Source: But no, he's a good man, and he makes fine steel. He also hates it when his apprentices stay out too late, so I better head on home.
String.Dest: But no, he's a good man, and he makes fine steel. He also hates it when his apprentices stay out too late, so I better head on home.

String.Source: I prefer to have a man's steel, if you know what I mean.
String.Dest: 我更喜欢男式武器，如果你知道我指的是什么。

String.Source: But I had fun speaking with you. Thank you, and good night.
String.Dest: 但是和你说话很有意思。谢谢你，晚安。

String.Source: I want to go back to my earlier questions.
String.Dest: 让我们回到先前的问题上。

String.Source: Alright.
String.Dest: 好吧。

String.Source: I agree. Crafting swords for nobles is like writing books for mudcrabs.
String.Dest: 我同意。为贵族造剑就跟写书给泥沼蟹看一样。

String.Source: (Laughs) I wouldn't go that far. I've met some pretty smart mudcrabs. But none were as sharp as you.
String.Dest: (笑声) 我才不会走那么远呢。我遇到过许多小泥沼蟹。但是没哪一个像你这样狡猾的。

String.Source: I found that book you wanted.
String.Dest: 我找到你要的书了。

String.Source: Brilliant. Leave it in the kitchen somewhere where I can see it. I'm sure you'll make good use of it too. You do everything well, my love.
String.Dest: 非常好。把它搁在厨房我能看得见的地方吧，我确信你也会好好利用它的。你什么都做的很好，亲爱的。

String.Source: I doubt you could forge anything worthwhile.
String.Dest: 我真怀疑你能造出什么有价值的东西。

String.Source: Oh, come on, didn't your mother ever tell you not to judge a blade by its gloss?
String.Dest: 噢，得了，你妈妈没告诉过你不要以貌取剑吗？

String.Source: I doubt you could forge anything worthwhile.
String.Dest: 我真怀疑你能造出什么有价值的东西。

String.Source: I may be an apprentice, but I come from a long line of legendary blacksmiths, and as part of my pilgrimage, I've trained with many more.
String.Dest: 我或许确实只是个学徒，但我来自于一个历史悠久的极富传奇色彩的铁匠世家。并且，在我的人生旅程中，我已身经百战极富经验。

String.Source: I doubt you could forge anything worthwhile.
String.Dest: 我真怀疑你能造出什么有价值的东西。

String.Source: Lod, Adrianne Avenicci and Beirand of Solitude will all vouch for my skill. Or you can take a chance on me yourself.
String.Dest: 罗德、阿德里安娜·阿文尼奇以及独孤城的贝尔兰德都能为我的技艺担保。或者你可以赌一把，亲自在我这儿试试。

String.Source: I doubt you could forge anything worthwhile.
String.Dest: 我真怀疑你能造出什么有价值的东西。

String.Source: I trust you won't be disappointed.
String.Dest: 我相信你不会失望的。

String.Source: Yes, I have siblings. I grew up in a fairly normal home.
String.Dest: 是的，我有兄弟姐妹。我生长在一个普通的家庭。

String.Source: That's probably why you're so well adjusted. It's always good to have siblings to share things with, and keep your ego in check.
String.Dest: 这可能就是你状态这么好的原因。有一些能够分享见闻的兄弟姐们一直都是好事，所以让你的自负控制在可以忍受的范围内。

String.Source: Yes, I have siblings. I grew up in a fairly normal home.
String.Dest: 是的，我有兄弟姐妹。我生长在一个普通的家庭。

String.Source: Some people will tell you that all heroes are flawed, that they have moments of weakness just like the rest of us.
String.Dest: 有些人会告诉你，所有的英雄都是有缺点的，他们虚弱的时候跟我们其他人一个样。

String.Source: Yes, I have siblings. I grew up in a fairly normal home.
String.Dest: 是的，我有兄弟姐妹。我生长在一个普通的家庭。

String.Source: But I don't think that applies to you, my love. I can tell that you're the sort of person who will always do what's right, even when it's hard.
String.Dest: 但我认为这不适合你。我的至爱。即使在困难的时候，我也可以告诉你，你做的永远是对的。

String.Source: You sound pretty horrible at hide and seek.
String.Dest: 你的声音在暗处的时候听起来相当恐怖。

String.Source: (Laughs) Yeah, the kids stopped asking me to play after a while. But I was always at the courtyard anyway, so it caused some confusion.
String.Dest: (笑声)是啊，孩子们停下来，问我要不要玩一会儿。但无论如何我也一直呆在庭院里，所以引发了一些混乱。

String.Source: You sound pretty horrible at hide and seek.
String.Dest: 你的声音在暗处的时候听起来相当恐怖。

String.Source: One of the boys would end up saying, "Who invited her?" And I'd tell him I was there first. Eventually they just started the game somewhere else.
String.Dest: 最后总有个男孩会问：“是谁邀请她来的？”然后我告诉他是我第一个到那儿的。最后他们只好另找地方玩他们的游戏去了。

String.Source: Well, that's a relief. Now I don't have to kill him.
String.Dest: 呼，解脱了。现在我不必非杀他不可了。

String.Source: (Laughs) So you definitely have a sense of humor. And I can tell by just looking at you that you're strong...and brave.
String.Dest: （笑声）你还真有幽默感。我能告诉你的是，在我看来，你又强壮……又勇敢。

String.Source: Well, that's a relief. Now I don't have to kill him.
String.Dest: 呼，解脱了。现在我不必非杀他不可了。

String.Source: Which makes three out of three. I am officially swooning.
String.Dest: 这三样都这么不错！我正沉醉在狂喜之中。

String.Source: My family aren't blood relatives, but people I trust.
String.Dest: 我的家族不是血缘关系的亲人，而是我信任的人。

String.Source: I've always felt the same. There's just some things you're more comfortable sharing with friends.
String.Dest: 我也有同样的感觉。某些东西只有当你和你的朋友分享时才会更美好。

String.Source: My family aren't blood relatives, but people I trust.
String.Dest: 我的家族不是血缘关系的亲人，而是我信任的人。

String.Source: And other things you can only share with the one you love. I won't give you any hints, but I'm sure you can use your imagination.
String.Dest: 而其他的事你只可以跟你的爱人分享。我不会给你任何暗示，但我确定你肯定能发挥你的想象力。

String.Source: I want to hear about your travels across Skyrim.
String.Dest: 我想听你讲讲在天际旅行的事。

String.Source: Well, I got my start in Solitude. I wanted to forge arms for all the brave Legionnaires fighting in Skyrim.
String.Dest: 好吧，我从独孤城开始我的铁匠生活. 我希望我能替在天际省的勇敢的军团战士铸造武器.

String.Source: I want to hear about your travels across Skyrim.
String.Dest: 我想听你讲讲在天际旅行的事。

String.Source: I got off the docks with nothing but a sack over my shoulder. I never told Beirand who my family was.
String.Dest: 我只背着一个麻袋离开了码头。我从没有告诉贝尔兰德的家族是什么。

String.Source: I want to hear about your travels across Skyrim.
String.Dest: 我想听你讲讲在天际旅行的事。

String.Source: I didn't want to color his perception of me. So I said I was a traveler, and asked if he needed an apprentice. He said he already had one.
String.Dest: I didn't want to color his perception of me. So I said I was a traveler, and asked if he needed an apprentice. He said he already had one.

String.Source: How did you train if you weren't his apprentice?
String.Dest: 如果你不是他的学徒，你是如何训练的？

String.Source: I want to hear about your travels across Skyrim.
String.Dest: 我想听你讲讲在天际旅行的事。

String.Source: He let me work the forge when it was free. At first he never said a word, but pretty soon he couldn't help but dole out advice.
String.Dest: 他让我在锻炉空闲的时候操作它，一开始他啥话也不说，但很快他就忍不住要指点一二了。

String.Source: How did you train if you weren't his apprentice?
String.Dest: 如果你不是他的学徒，你是如何训练的？

String.Source: I want to hear about your travels across Skyrim.
String.Dest: 我想听你讲讲在天际旅行的事。

String.Source: He'd say something like "Those dartwings you call arms can't shape steel. Put your hips into it."
String.Dest: 他会轻描淡写的说‘这些你称为装备的飞翼没法用钢打造。所以快滚吧。’

String.Source: How did you train if you weren't his apprentice?
String.Dest: 如果你不是他的学徒，你是如何训练的？

String.Source: I want to hear about your travels across Skyrim.
String.Dest: 我想听你讲讲在天际旅行的事。

String.Source: I forget how hot the forge is back home. The metal there's a lot easier to shape. But with Beirand's help, I learned to smith the Nord way.
String.Dest: 我回家的时候，都忘了熔炉到底有多滚烫。也忘了那里的金属会更容易成型。但在贝尔兰德的帮助下，我开始学会了用诺德人的方式打铁。

String.Source: What else did Beirand do for you?
String.Dest: 博兰德都为你做了什么?

String.Source: I want to hear about your travels across Skyrim.
String.Dest: 我想听你讲讲在天际旅行的事。

String.Source: Eventually, he thought enough of me that I should get a proper master. He sent a letter to Whiterun, and I couldn't contain my excitement.
String.Dest: 他想了很多，最终他还是觉得我应该找一个合适的主人。他往白漫城发了一封信，我简直无法抑制住我激动的心情。

String.Source: What else did Beirand do for you?
String.Dest: 博兰德都为你做了什么?

String.Source: I want to hear about your travels across Skyrim.
String.Dest: 我想听你讲讲在天际旅行的事。

String.Source: Then I met Adrianne. I recall looking at her modest setup, and with a straight face telling her how impressive the Skyforge was.
String.Dest: 然后我遇到了阿德里安娜。我不由得回想起那时看到她那端庄的服饰，我绷紧了自己的脸向她说那天空熔炉是多么令人印象深刻。

String.Source: It's difficult. Dangerous. And I couldn't live without it.
String.Dest: 很难。很危险。要没它我是活不成了。

String.Source: That sounds amazing. I can't even begin to imagine the sort of rush that comes with taking on a troll. Or a group of angry bandits.
String.Dest: 太可怕了，我甚至无法想象干掉一只巨魔，或者解决一组愤怒的强盗这种乱七八糟的任务分配。

String.Source: It's difficult. Dangerous. And I couldn't live without it.
String.Dest: 很难。很危险。要没它我是活不成了。

String.Source: But when I craft something, a part of me can be in your hand. Be your sword, or your shield. So you never have to go at it alone.
String.Dest: 但当我倒腾东西的时候, 我可以搭你一只手. 成为你的利刃，你的盾牌。所以你不必事必躬亲.

String.Source: Unfortunately, my family and I are estranged.
String.Dest: 不幸的是，我和我的家庭分开了。

String.Source: I can sympathize. I know families can fight over a lot of things, sometimes even the littlest ones.
String.Dest: 我能理解。我明白家人之间会吵架，有时甚至只是为了一些鸡毛蒜皮的小事。

String.Source: I don't think we'll run into any problems though. Some might say that's naive, but those people just haven't found the right person.
String.Dest: 不过我不认为我们会遇到任何问题。有些人可能会说这很天真，但只不过是他们还没找到对的那个人罢了。

String.Source: Unfortunately, my family and I are estranged.
String.Dest: 不幸的是，我和我的家庭分开了。

String.Source: We are bound together, and we fight together. My hands are yours, my love. Take this gift and vanquish your enemies.
String.Dest: 我俩注定相伴一生，共同作战。我的手就是你的手，亲爱的。拿着这礼物，然后去打败你的敌人吧。

String.Source: It must be a battleaxe. Two hands, two souls. Bound together.
String.Dest: 这应该是把战斧，两只手，两个灵魂，紧紧地连接在一起。

String.Source: I aim to. The Orcs say that everything you craft carries a piece of your spirit.
String.Dest: 我打算是，兽人说你做的每件东西都含有你的灵魂。

String.Source: Times change, and the old ways die. You should live your own life.
String.Dest: 世风日下，人心不古。你该过你自己的生活。

String.Source: A blade crafted with hate would be sharper, but heavier than a blade crafted with love.
String.Dest: 带着恨意做成的剑会更加锋利，但却比通过爱意制作而成的更加沉重。

String.Source: Times change, and the old ways die. You should live your own life.
String.Dest: 世风日下，人心不古。你该过你自己的生活。

String.Source: When the day comes that I must return to Kvatch, I won't have to tell my mother of my intentions. I need only forge them.
String.Dest: 当我必须回到科瓦奇城那天到来时，我不会告诉母亲我的意向。我只需要忘记他们。

String.Source: Times change, and the old ways die. You should live your own life.
String.Dest: 世风日下，人心不古。你该过你自己的生活。

String.Source: (Laughs) That's a good joke. And I know it's a joke, because I didn't marry the sort of person who frequents brothels.
String.Dest: (笑声) 真是个不错的笑话。我也知道这只个笑话，因为我才不会与那种妓院的常客结婚呢。

String.Source: I don't know her name. Brothel whores tend not to give them.
String.Dest: 我不知道她的名字。妓女们一般不会说名字的。

String.Source: But, I did marry a person with a great sense of humor.
String.Dest: But, I did marry a person with a great sense of humor.

String.Source: I don't know her name. Brothel whores tend not to give them.
String.Dest: 我不知道她的名字。妓女们一般不会说名字的。

String.Source: I enjoyed this talk. We should definitely have more, as long as it doesn't take away from your duties.
String.Dest: 我喜欢这么聊天儿。我们应该多聊一会儿，只要这不会让你擅离职守。

String.Source: I don't know her name. Brothel whores tend not to give them.
String.Dest: 我不知道她的名字。妓女们一般不会说名字的。

String.Source: And this is my home as well. But I don't mean Skyrim. Whatever land or earth is under your feet, that's where I belong.
String.Dest: 这是我的家。不过我不是指天际。在你脚下任何土地或者大地那是属于我的地方。

String.Source: This land, Skyrim, is where I call home. Especially now that I have you.
String.Dest: 这一片土地，天际，是我称之为家的地方。特别是当我现在拥有了你。

String.Source: The forge is old, and requires a lot of maintenance just to keep running. Plus it takes up a lot of land, and taxes are charged accordingly.
String.Dest: 这锻铁炉挺旧的了，还得需要大量的维修来保持运作。再加上它占了那么多的地，要交的税可不便宜。

String.Source: Who says you have to forge for nobles? You'll be in charge.
String.Dest: 谁说你非得为贵族做事不可？你可以自己做主！

String.Source: Mother hasn't taught me how to work the Star-Blood forge yet, but from what I understand, it's also extremely delicate.
String.Dest: 妈妈还没教我怎么星血熔炉, 但据我所知, 它非常的脆弱.

String.Source: Who says you have to forge for nobles? You'll be in charge.
String.Dest: 谁说你非得为贵族做事不可？你可以自己做主！

String.Source: Selling highly decorative, high-end craftsmanship is the only way the business can survive.
String.Dest: 卖贵重装饰和高档工艺是商人唯一的活路。

String.Source: Who says you have to forge for nobles? You'll be in charge.
String.Dest: 谁说你非得为贵族做事不可？你可以自己做主！

String.Source: Oh, I've heard about you. And I'd say being the Dragonborn qualifies as being both strong and brave. But the humility doesn't hurt either.
String.Dest: 噢，我听说过你。我想说作为龙裔就应该具备力量以及勇气。但谦逊一些也不是什么坏事。

String.Source: I wonder if I meet those qualifications.
String.Dest: 我不知道能否达那些要求啊。

String.Source: If I had to take a guess, I'd say you fit the classic hero mold. The humility doesn't hurt either.
String.Dest: 如果要我猜的话，我会说你就是一块做英雄的料。谦虚点也没什么影响。

String.Source: I wonder if I meet those qualifications.
String.Dest: 我不知道能否达那些要求啊。

String.Source: You're brave to ask a woman out you barely even know. That's a fine quality for any adventurer.
String.Dest: 你很勇敢，竟然想跟一个你压根儿不认识的妹子约会。这对每个冒险者来说，都是优秀的品质。

String.Source: I can tell you a story or two, perhaps over dinner.
String.Dest: 晚饭后我可以给你讲一两个小故事。

String.Source: Alright, how about you meet me at the inn for a drink. I'll be finished here at around sundown.
String.Dest: 好吧，要不我们一会儿在酒馆见面一起喝酒聊天。我现在这干完活，大约黄昏就完事了。

String.Source: I can tell you a story or two, perhaps over dinner.
String.Dest: 晚饭后我可以给你讲一两个小故事。

String.Source: So you're a charmer. I should be careful around you. Now I'm not going to refuse a compliment, but you're wrong about the hands.
String.Dest: 你很吸引人，但呆在你身边我要小心。我不会拒绝任何称赞, 但是动手动脚就不对了。

String.Source: Well met. Rare I meet a smith with such soft hands, and such radiant beauty.
String.Dest: 你好。我很少遇上像你这样拥有如此柔软的双手以及如此美丽耀眼的铁匠。

String.Source: They're as calloused as a Daedroth's backside, and like any good smith, I wear them with pride.
String.Dest: They're as calloused as a Daedroth's backside, and like any good smith, I wear them with pride.

String.Source: Well met. Rare I meet a smith with such soft hands, and such radiant beauty.
String.Dest: 你好。我很少遇上像你这样拥有如此柔软的双手以及如此美丽耀眼的铁匠。

String.Source: Just as my mother did, and all my foremothers back to the age when weapons were crafted with stone.
String.Dest: 就如我母亲所做的那样，以及与那些从石器时代开始就一直保持这一传统的我的女性祖先们一样。

String.Source: Well met. Rare I meet a smith with such soft hands, and such radiant beauty.
String.Dest: 你好。我很少遇上像你这样拥有如此柔软的双手以及如此美丽耀眼的铁匠。

String.Source: But I'm not a blacksmith yet. Just Isobel the Apprentice. I've come to Skyrim as part of pilgrimage, to learn how the Nords smith such fine blades.
String.Dest: 但我还不是一个铁匠。我只是学徒伊莎贝尔。天际省是我朝圣之旅的一部分，我想看看诺德人是如何打造出如此精良的武器的。

String.Source: Well met. Rare I meet a smith with such soft hands, and such radiant beauty.
String.Dest: 你好。我很少遇上像你这样拥有如此柔软的双手以及如此美丽耀眼的铁匠。

String.Source: So my lady is a charmer. I should be careful around you. Now I'm not going to refuse a compliment, but you're wrong about the hands.
String.Dest: So my lady is a charmer. I should be careful around you. Now I'm not going to refuse a compliment, but you're wrong about the hands.

String.Source: Well met. Rare I meet a smith with such soft hands, and such radiant beauty.
String.Dest: 你好。我很少遇上像你这样拥有如此柔软的双手以及如此美丽耀眼的铁匠。

String.Source: They're as calloused as a Daedroth's backside, and like any good smith, I wear them with pride.
String.Dest: They're as calloused as a Daedroth's backside, and like any good smith, I wear them with pride.

String.Source: Well met. Rare I meet a smith with such soft hands, and such radiant beauty.
String.Dest: 你好。我很少遇上像你这样拥有如此柔软的双手以及如此美丽耀眼的铁匠。

String.Source: Just as my mother did, and all my foremothers back to the age when weapons were crafted with stone.
String.Dest: 就如我母亲所做的那样，以及与那些从石器时代开始就一直保持这一传统的我的女性祖先们一样。

String.Source: Well met. Rare I meet a smith with such soft hands, and such radiant beauty.
String.Dest: 你好。我很少遇上像你这样拥有如此柔软的双手以及如此美丽耀眼的铁匠。

String.Source: But I'm not a blacksmith yet. Just Isobel the Apprentice. I've come to Skyrim as part of pilgrimage, to learn how the Nords smith such fine blades.
