String.Dest: 但我现在还不算是铁匠。只是一个名叫伊莎贝尔的学徒罢了。我跟着那些朝圣者的队伍来到了天际省，来学习诺德人那能锻造出如此精良的武器的技巧。

String.Source: Well met. Rare I meet a smith with such soft hands, and such radiant beauty.
String.Dest: 你好。我很少遇上像你这样拥有如此柔软的双手以及如此美丽耀眼的铁匠。

String.Source: It's alright. Although we've gotten a lot less visitors after the dragon attacked Helgen.
String.Dest: 没问题。尽管在巨龙袭击了海尔根之后我们这里就没什么参观者了。

String.Source: Do you ever get bored here in Falkreath?
String.Dest: 在佛克瑞斯你从未感到过厌倦吗？

String.Source: That's what I enjoyed most. Meeting all the travelers who crossed the border from Cyrodiil, and sharing stories of home.
String.Dest: 那就是我最享受的东西。遇见从赛瑞迪尔穿过边境来这里的旅行者，和他们分享家乡的事。

String.Source: Do you ever get bored here in Falkreath?
String.Dest: 在佛克瑞斯你从未感到过厌倦吗？

String.Source: But now you're here, and I can tell just by looking at your hands that you've got stories to tell.
String.Dest: 但现在你就在这里，而且我看看你的手就知道你有很多故事要讲。

String.Source: Do you ever get bored here in Falkreath?
String.Dest: 在佛克瑞斯你从未感到过厌倦吗？

String.Source: You don't say. And by the looks of it, you managed to keep your wits about you. Impressive.
String.Dest: 你没说。表面上看你设法发现是不是有人情绪不对劲。真是令人影响深刻。

String.Source: As a matter of fact, I was at Helgen when the dragon attacked.
String.Dest: 事实上，当巨龙来袭时我正好在海尔根。

String.Source: I probably would've been staring at it. No, not just staring. I'd be completely awestruck. I mean, a dragon. A fairy tale come to life.
String.Dest: 我可能会一直盯着它。不，不只是盯着。我会被完全被震撼的。嘿，那可是一头龙。活生生的童话里的生物。

String.Source: As a matter of fact, I was at Helgen when the dragon attacked.
String.Dest: 事实上，当巨龙来袭时我正好在海尔根。

String.Source: That's what I'd be thinking right before it turned me into roast. Which is why you're an adventurer, and I'm a blacksmith.
String.Dest: 那就是我在自己被烧成灰前考虑好的念头。这就是为什么你是个冒险家，而我只是个铁匠。

String.Source: As a matter of fact, I was at Helgen when the dragon attacked.
String.Dest: 事实上，当巨龙来袭时我正好在海尔根。

String.Source: And only child? You did well not to grow up spoiled. Still, I'd be willing to bet you never had anything handed to you.
String.Dest: 只是小孩吗？ 看上去你还没有被宠坏。 但是我还是要跟你打赌你一无是处.

String.Source: I have parents, but no brothers or sisters.
String.Dest: 我有父母，但没有兄弟姐妹。

String.Source: That's why you're a true hero, and someday, the bards will write paeans about your life.
String.Dest: 这就是为什么说你是个真英雄的原因，总有一天，吟游诗人会为你的人生写下颂歌。

String.Source: I have parents, but no brothers or sisters.
String.Dest: 我有父母，但没有兄弟姐妹。

String.Source: I know it sounds crazy but, when I watch you walk out of the door in the morning, I know you're making life better for a lot of folks.
String.Dest: I know it sounds crazy but, when I watch you walk out of the door in the morning, I know you're making life better for a lot of folks.

String.Source: I have parents, but no brothers or sisters.
String.Dest: 我有父母，但没有兄弟姐妹。

String.Source: No, to be honest, I live a rather boring life.
String.Dest: 不，实话说，我更宁愿过一个无聊平淡的生活。

String.Source: Somehow I find that hard to believe. But modesty...that's something I wouldn't put past you.
String.Dest: 不知怎么我发现很难相信。但是退一步讲……有的事情我是不以为然的。

String.Source: No, to be honest, I live a rather boring life.
String.Dest: 不，实话说，我更宁愿过一个无聊平淡的生活。

String.Source: Or you could be lying, but I prefer to imagine adventurers as humble, rather than sneaky.
String.Dest: 不然你就是在说谎，我更愿意把探险者想成是谦卑的姿态，而不是鬼鬼祟祟的怂包。

String.Source: No, to be honest, I live a rather boring life.
String.Dest: 不，实话说，我更宁愿过一个无聊平淡的生活。

String.Source: Somehow I find that hard to believe. But modesty...that's something I wouldn't put past you.
String.Dest: 不知怎么我发现很难相信。但是退一步讲……有的事情我是不以为然的。

String.Source: No, to be honest, I live a rather boring life.
String.Dest: 不，实话说，我更宁愿过一个无聊平淡的生活。

String.Source: Or you could be lying, but I prefer to imagine my lady as humble, rather than sneaky.
String.Dest: 或者你在说谎， 我宁愿想象我的夫人是谦逊的也不愿把你想象成是鬼鬼祟祟的。

String.Source: A small village. The kind that sort of drift around with the river.
String.Dest: 一个小村庄，四面环水的那种。

String.Source: Oh, I've heard about those. A friend of mine back in Kvatch was a pretty avid reader, and he'd tell me stories about Decumus Scotti's adventures.
String.Dest: 哦，我听说过这些。我的一个在科瓦奇城的朋友是个热心读者，他跟我讲了这个关于德西默斯·斯科蒂的冒险故事。

String.Source: A small village. The kind that sort of drift around with the river.
String.Dest: 一个小村庄，四面环水的那种。

String.Source: I don't care much for books though. I'm a fairly typical blacksmith in that regard.
String.Dest: 我对书本没什么兴趣。在这方面我是一个相当典型的铁匠。

String.Source: A small village. The kind that sort of drift around with the river.
String.Dest: 一个小村庄，四面环水的那种。

String.Source: But anyhow, do you have family back in Black Marsh? Any brothers or sisters?
String.Dest: 总之你在黑沼泽省有亲人吗？有没有兄弟姐妹？

String.Source: Of course they have, my love. All the good you did for Falkreath, I knew you were no ordinary adventurer. They're lucky to have you.
String.Dest: 他们应当如此，亲爱的。你为佛克瑞斯做出了如此大的贡献，我就知道你不是普通的冒险者。能有你在一旁助力可真是他们的荣幸啊。

String.Source: The Companions have accepted me into their ranks.
String.Dest: 战友团已经接受我到他们的队伍之中。

String.Source: Are you saying what I think you're saying? You know what happened to Indara's daughter, right? (Sigh) I'll go get the broom.
String.Dest: 我们是在说同一件事吗？你知道在因达拉的女儿身上发生的事对吗？（叹息）我去拿扫帚了。

String.Source: Let's just say you might find more hair around the house.
String.Dest: 这么说吧，你可能会在房子里找到更多的头发。

String.Source: I'm sorry to hear that. The way you described him, he seemed like a kind man...or a kind wolf, as it were.
String.Dest: 听到这个消息我很难过。按照你的说法，他应该是一个很好的人……或者说一个很好的狼人，就像以前一样。

String.Source: Kodlak Whitemane is dead.
String.Dest: 克拉科·白鬃死了。

String.Source: You must be heartbroken, my love. I'll light an extra candle tonight by the hearth. Maybe it will help show him the way to Sovngarde.
String.Dest: 你一定很伤心，我的爱人。今晚我将会在壁炉旁多点些蜡烛。也许这可以照亮他前往松加德的路。

String.Source: Kodlak Whitemane is dead.
String.Dest: 克拉科·白鬃死了。

String.Source: That's amazing! Not even a Daedric Prince can stop you from righting the ills of this world. You are every bit the Hero of Kvatch and more.
String.Dest: 太神奇了！就算是魔神也无法阻止你纠正这个世界的弊病 。你绝对是名副其实的科瓦奇的英雄。

String.Source: I freed Kodlak's spirit. The Companions made me Harbinger.
String.Dest: 我给予克拉科的灵魂以自由，伙伴们让我成为了预言者。

String.Source: As a matter of fact, I'm from Kvatch. But I've always been the shy type.
String.Dest: 实际上，我来自科瓦奇城，但是我依然总是害羞。

String.Source: Really, my love? Granted, I didn't get out much either. After long nights working the forge, I was too tired to leave the house.
String.Dest: 真的吗，亲爱的？就算如此，我出门的次数也不多。每晚在锻炉的工作让我太疲劳了，以至于我没有力气走出家门。

String.Source: As a matter of fact, I'm from Kvatch. But I've always been the shy type.
String.Dest: 实际上，我来自科瓦奇城，但是我依然总是害羞。

String.Source: Still, strange that we never met. Does your family still live there? Do you have any brothers or sisters?
String.Dest: 啊，又是没见过的陌生人。您家人可好？有兄弟姐妹吗？

String.Source: How did that story come about?
String.Dest: 那个故事是如何发生的呢？

String.Source: Legend has it that then when the Daedra invaded, she refused to leave her shop, smithing weapons for the townsfolk until the last man had fallen.
String.Dest: 传说当魔族入侵之时，她拒绝离开她的铺子，直到最后一个人的鲜血将这里染红为止，她一直在为民兵们打造兵器。

String.Source: How did that story come about?
String.Dest: 那个故事是如何发生的呢？

String.Source: That's why only those who share her blood can use the forge, and tradition that the firstborn daughter would be the one to inherit it.
String.Dest: 这就是为什么只有跟她流淌着同样血液的人才能使用这个熔炉的原因了， 传统来说，长女正是那个要继承它的人。

String.Source: How did that story come about?
String.Dest: 那个故事是如何发生的呢？

String.Source: That...would be me. It's an honor...I suppose.
String.Dest: 那……应该是我。是个荣誉吧……我觉得。

String.Source: You come from a family of blacksmiths?
String.Dest: 你出身于一个铁匠家庭？

String.Source: Not just any family. Ever heard of the The Star-Blood Forge? My family has been the caretaker of it for centuries.
String.Dest: 不是个普普通通的家族。听说过星血熔炉吗？我的家族经营了上百年。

String.Source: You come from a family of blacksmiths?
String.Dest: 你出身于一个铁匠家庭？

String.Source: It was made not long after the Oblivion Crisis, and next to the old memorial and the Hero's Statue, it's one of the most iconic landmarks in Kvatch.
String.Dest: 它建造于湮灭危机过去不久之后，就在古老的纪念碑和英雄的雕像旁边，它是科瓦奇城这是最具代表性的建筑。

String.Source: You come from a family of blacksmiths?
String.Dest: 你出身于一个铁匠家庭？

String.Source: They say it was built atop a well of Daedric blood, and it's in that well that the weapons are cooled.
String.Dest: 有人说这把武器是在有着魔族之血的井上打造的, 这样的武器需要井里的血来冷却。

String.Source: You come from a family of blacksmiths?
String.Dest: 你出身于一个铁匠家庭？

String.Source: Some even say the forge itself is haunted. Specifically, with the soul of one my ancestors.
String.Dest: 一些人甚至说这铁匠铺本身就是闹鬼的。具体的说，是我一位祖先的灵魂。

String.Source: It does get lonely out there. Less so if I had you to come home to.
String.Dest: 它在那边好寂寞啊，所以最少我也要带你回家去。

String.Source: I...I don't know what to say. Am I blushing? I feel like I'm blushing.
String.Dest: 我……我不知道该说些什么。我脸红了吗?我觉得我的脸好烫。

String.Source: It does get lonely out there. Less so if I had you to come home to.
String.Dest: 它在那边好寂寞啊，所以最少我也要带你回家去。

String.Source: The truth is, I've always dreamed of someone like you coming into town, righting wrongs, helping the townsfolk.
String.Dest: 事实上，我一直梦想你这样的人到城里来，伸张正义，帮助市民。

String.Source: It does get lonely out there. Less so if I had you to come home to.
String.Dest: 它在那边好寂寞啊，所以最少我也要带你回家去。

String.Source: And maybe falling in love with the blacksmith's apprentice.
String.Dest: 并且可能爱上了铁匠的学徒……

String.Source: It does get lonely out there. Less so if I had you to come home to.
String.Dest: 它在那边好寂寞啊，所以最少我也要带你回家去。

String.Source: I'd forge your weapons and armor, and they would keep you company on the lonely road.
String.Dest: 我可以锻造你的武器和盔甲，这样它们就能在你那孤独的旅途中守护着你了。

String.Source: It does get lonely out there. Less so if I had you to come home to.
String.Dest: 它在那边好寂寞啊，所以最少我也要带你回家去。

String.Source: I'd hammer out any dent, sharpen every edge. So your weapons and our love, would be born anew.
String.Dest: 我都会敲平盔甲上的凹痕，磨利刀剑上的钝处。因此你的武器和我们的爱，都能得以重获新生。

String.Source: No, not in the kingdoms where I grew up.
String.Dest: 不，不是在我成长的王国。

String.Source: Aye, I did suspect when we met you were some kind of noble. Like a warrior prince, who left the crown to chase adventure.
String.Dest: 啊，当我见到你的时候我猜你是某个贵族，比如说一个勇敢的王子，放下王冠，来寻求冒险。

String.Source: No, not in the kingdoms where I grew up.
String.Dest: 不，不是在我成长的王国。

String.Source: Speaking of which, what about family? Do you have any brothers or sisters?
String.Dest: 说到这儿，你的家庭是怎么样的呢？你有兄弟或姐妹吗？

String.Source: You forget how hot it is down there. You might sweat to death first.
String.Dest: 你忘了这下面有多烫，你会直接蒸发掉的。

String.Source: (Laughs) Or they might die from the smell. I've repaired some armor where I had to stick redworts up my nose to get anywhere near it.
String.Dest: (笑声) 他们可能会被这气味熏死的。我在鼻子够得着甜麦汁的地方修好了一些盔甲。

String.Source: You forget how hot it is down there. You might sweat to death first.
String.Dest: 你忘了这下面有多烫，你会直接蒸发掉的。

String.Source: But that's not something I want to think about. At least not now. Do you have family back in Elsweyr? Any brothers or sisters?
String.Dest: 但是那不是我想要考虑的事情。至少现在不是。你在艾斯维尔有家人吗？有什么兄弟姐妹吗？

String.Source: Why, were you worried I'd stand you up? Not likely. The locals call me the town greeter. I never pass on a chance to talk to a fresh face.
String.Dest: 为什么，被你担心我会站在你这边？不太可能。当地人叫我小镇迎宾员。我从来没有把约会的机会，给过一个新面孔。

String.Source: Isobel. I'm glad you came.
String.Dest: 伊莎贝尔。你能来真是太好了。

String.Source: So, I'm here. We can get to know each other first and our drinks second, but the other way is fine too.
String.Dest: 所以说，我在这儿。我们可以先互相了解一下，再开怀畅饮一番，不过还有另一个方式也可以增进我们之间的友谊。

String.Source: Isobel. I'm glad you came.
String.Dest: 伊莎贝尔。你能来真是太好了。

String.Source: Aye, it's been a while since I've come down here. Ever since that Thalmor showed up, I get sort of worried about her and Bolund getting into it.
String.Dest: 是啊，我来这里也有些日子了。当梭默出现的时候，我开始担心她和布伦德陷入其中。

String.Source: Isobel. Fancy meeting you here.
String.Dest: 伊莎贝尔……怎么会在这里遇见你？

String.Source: But when a new adventurer comes into town, I like to head on over to the inn, and maybe strike up a conversation.
String.Dest: 但是当一个新的冒险家来到镇上时，我就喜欢往酒馆儿里钻，也许能跟他搭讪成功呢。

String.Source: Isobel. Fancy meeting you here.
String.Dest: 伊莎贝尔……怎么会在这里遇见你？

String.Source: Here I was, trying to come up with the nerve to go and talk to you, and in the meantime you came over to me. So, what's on your mind?
String.Dest: 我在这儿，好不容易拿出点儿勇气想去找你，就看你迎面朝我走来了。那么，你在想什么？

String.Source: Isobel. Fancy meeting you here.
String.Dest: 伊莎贝尔……怎么会在这里遇见你？

String.Source: You mentioned you were from Kvatch.
String.Dest: 你说你是来自于科瓦奇城的。

String.Source: That's right. I was born there after the Great War. A lot of children were, once everyone knew we'd have peace.
String.Dest: 没错。浩大战争结束后我在那里出生。很多小孩都在那里出生，曾经所有人都认为和平会持续。

String.Source: You mentioned you were from Kvatch.
String.Dest: 你说你是来自于科瓦奇城的。

String.Source: As you can imagine, it's a city that reveres its heroes. None more so than the Hero of Kvatch, whose statue stands in the castle courtyard.
String.Dest: 你可以想象，那是个崇拜英雄的城市。没什么比得上科瓦奇城的英雄了，他的雕像就屹立在城堡的庭院里。

String.Source: You mentioned you were from Kvatch.
String.Dest: 你说你是来自于科瓦奇城的。

String.Source: I remember when the other kids played hide and seek, we used it as a starting spot. But I just stayed there the whole time, marveling at it.
String.Dest: 我记得当其他小孩玩捉迷藏的时候，我们曾把这里当作起点。但我总是一直呆在这里，为它而惊叹。

String.Source: You mentioned you were from Kvatch.
String.Dest: 你说你是来自于科瓦奇城的。

String.Source: The Hero of Kvatch was my idol. But my mother was always quick to remind me that no hero does it alone.
String.Dest: 科瓦奇城的英雄是我的偶像。可妈妈总是马上提醒我没有哪个英雄是一个人成功的。

String.Source: You mentioned you were from Kvatch.
String.Dest: 你说你是来自于科瓦奇城的。

String.Source: That's how I was hooked into the blacksmith trade. I wanted to be the next hero's shield. I wanted to be their armor, and their sword.
String.Dest: 那就是我为何迷恋于铁匠生意。我想成为下一个英雄的盾，我想成为他们的护甲和利刃。

String.Source: I'm an extremely picky eater.
String.Dest: 我的确非常挑食。

String.Source: By the Eight, was there something wrong with one of your meals? I should've asked you before I prepared it.
String.Dest: 八圣灵啊，你们的食物是不是有问题啊？我本应该在准备前问你。

String.Source: I'm an extremely picky eater.
String.Dest: 我的确非常挑食。

String.Source: I had a friend once who couldn't eat peanuts. Not because he didn't like them, but because they gave him a terrible rash.
String.Dest: 我曾有过一个不能吃花生的朋友。但倒不是因为他不喜欢花生，而是因为他会为此起皮疹。

String.Source: I'm an extremely picky eater.
String.Dest: 我的确非常挑食。

String.Source: I hope it isn't anything like that. You should make a list of what you can and can't eat, and I'll make sure to keep it out of your meals.
String.Dest: 我希望事情并非如此。你应该列张表记录是否食用物品，而我按表来控制你的饮食。

String.Source: You stay at Lod's house. Are the two of you together?
String.Dest: 你留在了罗德的房子里，那另外两个人跟你在一起吗？

String.Source: Me and Lod? (Laughs) By the Eight, no. He's old enough to be my grandfather, I think, and slow enough to be my anvil.
String.Dest: 我和罗德？(笑声) 八圣灵在上，当然不是啦。他老得都能当我的祖父了。而且行动缓慢到都能当我的铁砧了。

String.Source: You stay at Lod's house. Are the two of you together?
String.Dest: 你留在了罗德的房子里，那另外两个人跟你在一起吗？

String.Source: That, and he's not my type. I prefer strong leaders, brave warriors, and a sense of humor wouldn't hurt. But Lod's a good man, loyal and kind.
String.Dest: 他不是我喜欢的类型。我更喜欢强大的领导人，勇敢的战士，充满无害的幽默感又。但罗德是个好人，忠诚而善良。

String.Source: Like it or not, you should respect the tradition of your ancestors.
String.Dest: 不管你乐意与否，你得尊重你祖先所留下来的传统。

String.Source: It's not that I don't respect what the forge was, but I don't like what it's become.
String.Dest: 这并不是说我并不尊敬它锻造出的东西，但是我真的不喜欢这些东西将要成为的角色……也就是凶器。

String.Source: That's all the questions I have.
String.Dest: 我的问题问完了。

String.Source: Alright. Now it's my turn. So, what's it like being an adventurer? It must be exciting to wander Skyrim, never knowing what tomorrow will bring.
String.Dest: 好吧。现在轮到我了。那么，作一个冒险者是什么感觉？徜徉整个天际省一定是令人激动的，永远不知道明天会发生什么。

String.Source: That's all the questions I have.
String.Dest: 我的问题问完了。

String.Source: Alright. This was...interesting. You're a lot different from what I expected. But it was nice talking to you.
String.Dest: 好吧。这挺……有趣的。你跟我期望的有很大不同。但很高兴跟你聊天。

String.Source: I think you and Lod would make a great couple.
String.Dest: 我觉得你和罗德会是不错的一对儿。

String.Source: If you're trying to convince me you have a sense of humor, it's working. But I don't know if pushing me toward Lod helps your case.
String.Dest: 如果你在像我证明你有幽默感，唔，还行。但是我不知道如果我和罗德见面能不能帮到你。

String.Source: I think you and Lod would make a great couple.
String.Dest: 我觉得你和罗德会是不错的一对儿。

String.Source: I'm kidding of course. I get the hint. I'll try to keep it cordial.
String.Dest: I'm kidding of course. I get the hint. I'll try to keep it cordial.

String.Source: That sounds almost romantic. Like a forge wife and her warrior spouse.
String.Dest: 听上去少了些浪漫。像是做铁匠的妻子和她的战士丈夫。

String.Source: I admit, I had a fantasy or two about the Hero of Kvatch. And part of me used to dream of being the wife of a great hero.
String.Dest: 我承认，我有过一两个有关科瓦奇城英雄的幻想。其中一部分是我曾经梦想成为一名伟大英雄的妻子。

String.Source: That sounds almost romantic. Like a forge wife and her warrior spouse.
String.Dest: 听上去少了些浪漫。像是做铁匠的妻子和她的战士丈夫。

String.Source: That's why I'm in Skyrim. With the war, and talk of dragons...maybe I'll meet the next great legend right here in Falkreath. Maybe that might be you.
String.Dest: 那就是为什么我在天际省。这场战争，还有龙……也许我会在佛克瑞斯迎来一个伟大的传奇吧。或许那传奇就是你。

String.Source: The Hero of Kvatch is half the hero I am.
String.Dest: 我是 科瓦奇城的英雄，估计只算半个英雄吧。

String.Source: I like your confidence, but you have to remember who you're talking to. I'm from Kvatch.
String.Dest: 我喜欢你的自信，但是别忘了你在和谁说话。我来自科瓦奇城。

String.Source: The Hero of Kvatch is half the hero I am.
String.Dest: 我是 科瓦奇城的英雄，估计只算半个英雄吧。

String.Source: And we're known to be pretty stubborn when it comes to one of our own.
String.Dest: 当类似的事牵涉到自身时，我们则会以异常的固执而闻名。

String.Source: Revenge. And the only thing that's troubling me as how best to make him suffer.
String.Dest: 复仇。并且唯一令我困扰的是怎么才能使他最痛苦。

String.Source: That doesn't sound like the person I married. A true hero shows mercy, even to their enemies.
String.Dest: That doesn't sound like the person I married. A true hero shows mercy, even to their enemies.

String.Source: Revenge. And the only thing that's troubling me as how best to make him suffer.
String.Dest: 复仇。并且唯一令我困扰的是怎么才能使他最痛苦。

String.Source: But in this case, I hate to say it, but I don't think mercy or torture is an option. Remember who your opponent is.
String.Dest: But in this case, I hate to say it, but I don't think mercy or torture is an option. Remember who your opponent is.

String.Source: Revenge. And the only thing that's troubling me as how best to make him suffer.
String.Dest: 复仇。并且唯一令我困扰的是怎么才能使他最痛苦。

String.Source: A dragon, and from what you've told me, not just any dragon. This one is second only to the World Eater.
String.Dest: 一条龙，而且根据你告诉我的情况，这可不是一般的龙。这是仅次于世界吞噬者的家伙。

String.Source: Revenge. And the only thing that's troubling me as how best to make him suffer.
String.Dest: 复仇。并且唯一令我困扰的是怎么才能使他最痛苦。

String.Source: Your only goal should be to kill him and survive. Of course, I'll be with you as always.
String.Dest: 你的唯一目标应该是杀掉他并且活下来。当然，我会一直在你身边。

String.Source: Heroes are as poor as beggars. A good smith should be rewarded for their work.
String.Dest: Heroes are as poor as beggars. A good smith should be rewarded for their work.

String.Source: A man's worth isn't measured in gold. And there's a difference between what you call a reward and what I consider rewarding.
String.Dest: 人的价值不能用金钱来衡量。而且你对报酬的定义与我愿意支付的报酬之间还是有差异的。

String.Source: Heroes are as poor as beggars. A good smith should be rewarded for their work.
String.Dest: Heroes are as poor as beggars. A good smith should be rewarded for their work.

String.Source: When a guard comes to me and tells me my armor stopped an arrow inches from his heart, or that my mace split a troll skull with a single bludgeon...
String.Dest: 当一个守卫过来说跟我说，我做的盔甲将一支利箭挡在了离他心脏只有几英尺的地方时，又或者我锻造的狼牙棒仅仅一击就让一个食人魔的脑袋开了花时……

String.Source: Heroes are as poor as beggars. A good smith should be rewarded for their work.
String.Dest: Heroes are as poor as beggars. A good smith should be rewarded for their work.

String.Source: It fills me with a warmth that no amount of coin can replicate.
String.Dest: 那种感觉……成就感……根本不是金币能够搞定的。

String.Source: I don't know. I've been away from home for so long.
String.Dest: 我不知道。我已经离开家太久了。

String.Source: Homesick, my love? Can't say I know that feeling. I've been doing everything I can to stay away, given the whole inheritance thing.
String.Dest: 思乡了，我亲爱的？虽不能说我感同身受。考虑到继承遗产的关系，我已尽力不沉迷其中。

String.Source: I don't know. I've been away from home for so long.
String.Dest: 我不知道。我已经离开家太久了。

String.Source: What about you, do you have family back home?
String.Dest: 你呢？你有家人吗？

String.Source: I noticed your family didn't make it to the wedding.
String.Dest: 我注意到你的家人没有让它来参加婚礼。

String.Source: Things are busy in Kvatch. After what happened in the Great War, and with the Thalmor having gained control of southern Hammerfell...
String.Dest: 科瓦奇城的形式还真是变幻莫测啊。刚忙完世界大战那档子事儿，紧接着又跟梭默一起取得了落锤省南部的控制权……

String.Source: I noticed your family didn't make it to the wedding.
String.Dest: 我注意到你的家人没有让它来参加婚礼。

String.Source: It's just a matter of time before they march into Cyrodiil again. So my mother is working the forge day and night in preparation.
String.Dest: 他们再次进军赛瑞迪尔只是时间问题。所以我的妈妈日夜打造装备以作准备。

String.Source: I noticed your family didn't make it to the wedding.
String.Dest: 我注意到你的家人没有让它来参加婚礼。

String.Source: And now that I'm married, my sister will likely inherit the family legacy. But it turns out she's already been preparing to undergo the ritual.
String.Dest: 现在我结婚了，我的姐姐大概会继承家族的遗产。但事实上她已经准备接受仪式了。

String.Source: I noticed your family didn't make it to the wedding.
String.Dest: 我注意到你的家人没有让它来参加婚礼。

String.Source: Part of me wonders now if mother agreed to this pilgrimage knowing that I would never come back.
String.Dest: 其实我现在也有点好奇，当初若是我的母亲知道我会一去不复返的话，她还会不会同意我踏上这朝圣之旅呢。

String.Source: I noticed your family didn't make it to the wedding.
String.Dest: 我注意到你的家人没有让它来参加婚礼。

String.Source: But listen to me, rattling on about my own family. It occurs to me now that I've never asked you where you're from.
String.Dest: 但你在听我说话，听我喋喋不休地说着我自己的家庭。这让我想到，我还从来没问过你从哪儿来呢。

String.Source: And wherever you stand, I shall call home as well.
String.Dest: 这天下的地盘都是我的，不管你走到哪里，所处的位置都是在我的家里。

String.Source: I do love it when you're being romantic. But we have plenty of time for that later. Right now I want to know more about you.
String.Dest: I do love it when you're being romantic. But we have plenty of time for that later. Right now I want to know more about you.

String.Source: And wherever you stand, I shall call home as well.
String.Dest: 这天下的地盘都是我的，不管你走到哪里，所处的位置都是在我的家里。

String.Source: Which reminds me, I've never asked you about your family, have I?
String.Dest: 这倒是提醒我了，我从没问过你的家事呢，是吧？

String.Source: I do whatever brings the most profit. That happens to be adventuring.
String.Dest: 我不择手段获取最大利益，那或许也是非常冒险的。

String.Source: Seriously? Wouldn't that make you more of a sellsword than an adventurer? I don't want to imagine I'm forging armor for bandits and profiteers.
String.Dest: 你是认真的吗？那不是把你从冒险者变成佣兵了吗？我可不愿想象自己在为强盗和奸商造装备。

String.Source: I do whatever brings the most profit. That happens to be adventuring.
String.Dest: 我不择手段获取最大利益，那或许也是非常冒险的。

String.Source: I prefer to think I'm making that shield for the lonely warriors. To protect them from harm, and to keep them company.
String.Dest: 我更喜欢这种说法：“我正在为一个孤独的战士打造一面盾牌，保护他免受伤害并且永不离弃。”

String.Source: You're right. No hero goes it alone. What you do is admirable.
String.Dest: 你说的没错，没有英雄是独自一人的，你的做法让我很钦佩。

String.Source: I know, but I don't want to be some footnote in the hero's tale. I want the things I forge to be personal.
String.Dest: 我懂，可我只是不想做别人英雄事迹的脚注而已。我想要的是自己的成就。

String.Source: You're right. No hero goes it alone. What you do is admirable.
String.Dest: 你说的没错，没有英雄是独自一人的，你的做法让我很钦佩。

String.Source: Someday, I want to forge something that represents more than honor. Something that speaks to my inner devotion, and a true love.
String.Dest: 总有一天，我要锻造一个东西，它不仅仅代表荣誉。更代表着我心底赤诚、真挚的爱恋。

String.Source: You're right. No hero goes it alone. What you do is admirable.
String.Dest: 你说的没错，没有英雄是独自一人的，你的做法让我很钦佩。

String.Source: So when they say, "No hero goes it alone," it won't be some empty phrase.
String.Dest: 因而，如若他们说“英雄从不独自前行”一样，我相信这句话的真理。

String.Source: You're right. No hero goes it alone. What you do is admirable.
String.Dest: 你说的没错，没有英雄是独自一人的，你的做法让我很钦佩。

String.Source: But I'm getting ahead of myself. First, I need to meet that person, and second, I need to improve as a blacksmith.
String.Dest: 不过我好像想太远了。首先，我需要遇到那个人，其次，作为一名铁匠我还需要有所提高。

String.Source: By the Gods woman, it's obvious you are describing me as your ideal mate.
String.Dest: 众神在上啊，妹子，很明显你把我描述成你的理想伴侣了。

String.Source: Oh! I didn't mean to come on too strong! I'm sorry if I offended you. Really.
String.Dest: Oh! I didn't mean to come on too strong! I'm sorry if I offended you. Really.

String.Source: By the Gods woman, it's obvious you are describing me as your ideal mate.
String.Dest: 众神在上啊，妹子，很明显你把我描述成你的理想伴侣了。

String.Source: I've always been fascinated by heroes and brave, capable warriors. It came from listening to my parents tell me tales of the Hero of Kvatch.
String.Dest: 我一直很迷恋英雄和强大的勇士，自我小时候听父母讲科瓦奇群英的传说我就开始了。

String.Source: By the Gods woman, it's obvious you are describing me as your ideal mate.
String.Dest: 众神在上啊，妹子，很明显你把我描述成你的理想伴侣了。

String.Source: So when I meet someone like yourself, sometimes I might come across as a bit too forward. I really just want to know more about your adventures.
String.Dest: 有时候我遇见像你这样的人的话会积极一点……我真的只是想了解一下你的冒险而已。

String.Source: I'm a member of the Dark Brotherhood.
String.Dest: 我是黑暗兄弟会的其中一员。

String.Source: I'm sorry, my hearing must have gone bad. For a second I thought you said you joined the Dark Brotherhood.
String.Dest: 抱歉我耳朵一定是有毛病。刚才我以为你说你要加入暗黑兄弟会。

String.Source: I'm a member of the Dark Brotherhood.
String.Dest: 我是黑暗兄弟会的其中一员。

String.Source: Which is ridiculous. You would never break my heart like that.
String.Dest: Which is ridiculous. You would never break my heart like that.

String.Source: It seems Morrowind is always rebuilding.
String.Dest: 似乎晨风总是在重建中。

String.Source: They should recruit my mother. She's as good a builder as she is a swordsmith. She can make castles out of boards and nails.
String.Dest: 他们应该招募我妈妈。她是个出色的建筑师和铸剑师。她懂得如何用板材和钉子造出一座城堡。

String.Source: It seems Morrowind is always rebuilding.
String.Dest: 似乎晨风总是在重建中。

String.Source: You hand me the same materials, and I'll probably make a club with the nails sticking out of it.
String.Dest: 你给了我同样的材料，我可能会做一把粘满钉子尖朝外的狼牙棒。

String.Source: It seems Morrowind is always rebuilding.
String.Dest: 似乎晨风总是在重建中。

String.Source: What about you, do you have family back home?
String.Dest: 你呢？你有家人吗？

String.Source: Didn't the Aldmeri Dominion conquer Kvatch in the Great War?
String.Dest: 难道在世界大战中先祖神洲没能攻克科瓦奇城吗？

String.Source: You know your history. Fact is, they took a lot of cities, Kvatch included. But my mother says they never would have held it.
String.Dest: 你所知道的是你的历史。事实上，他们占领了很多城市，其中包括了科瓦奇城。但我的母亲说，他们从未占领过科瓦奇城。

String.Source: Didn't the Aldmeri Dominion conquer Kvatch in the Great War?
String.Dest: 难道在世界大战中先祖神洲没能攻克科瓦奇城吗？

String.Source: To hear her tell it, we would've taken Kvatch back, if not for the Concordant. And her blades would've killed a whole lot of Thalmor.
String.Dest: 要不是因为议会，我们不会在听科瓦奇说出来之前就把她带回去，那样她的剑还会杀更多的梭默。

String.Source: Didn't the Aldmeri Dominion conquer Kvatch in the Great War?
String.Dest: 难道在世界大战中先祖神洲没能攻克科瓦奇城吗？

String.Source: Still, the treaty did gave us our home back. And if there's one thing the people of Kvatch know, it's how to rebuild.
String.Dest: 不过，那条约也确实把我们的家还给了我们。并且如果有一件事科瓦奇的人都知道，那就是它是如何重建的。

String.Source: I actually travel with companions. So I don't get too lonely.
String.Dest: 事实上我和伙伴同行。因此并不太孤独。

String.Source: Sure. I guess I sometimes forget how many of you like to work in groups.
String.Dest: 是啊。我好像老是忘记你们大多数都喜欢扎堆工作。

String.Source: I actually travel with companions. So I don't get too lonely.
String.Dest: 事实上我和伙伴同行。因此并不太孤独。

String.Source: That's what happens when you grow up on stories about the Hero of Kvatch, closing Oblivion gates and saving the world without a single companion.
String.Dest: 那就是你在听着英雄科瓦奇孤身一人关闭湮灭之门拯救世界的故事长大时所发生的事。

String.Source: I actually travel with companions. So I don't get too lonely.
String.Dest: 事实上我和伙伴同行。因此并不太孤独。

String.Source: Which is probably untrue. I'm sure the Hero traveled with many a friend, and relied on many more. That's all part of the adventurers journey.
String.Dest: 那可不一定。那位英雄肯定有许多朋友一路同行，出门靠朋友嘛。所有的冒险者日记都这么写的。

String.Source: I actually travel with companions. So I don't get too lonely.
String.Dest: 事实上我和伙伴同行。因此并不太孤独。

String.Source: But I don't think my version of history is going to hurt anyone.
String.Dest: 但我不认为我的说法会导致任何人受到伤害。

String.Source: I actually travel with companions. So I don't get too lonely.
String.Dest: 事实上我和伙伴同行。因此并不太孤独。

String.Source: In any event, it's been fun, but it's getting late. I'm going to get some sleep. Come by the shop in the morning if you need anything.
String.Dest: 不管如何,它真有趣,天色晚了，我要回家补个觉。想要什么明天再来店里找我。

String.Source: I prefer the quiet times. Coming to new towns, and meeting new people.
String.Dest: 我更喜欢和平的年代。可以前往新的城镇，可以见到新的人们。

String.Source: Really? That's not what I expected. But it must get rather lonely out there on the road.
String.Dest: 真的？这可不是我所期望的。但它在外面路上肯定觉得很孤独了。

String.Source: I prefer the quiet times. Coming to new towns, and meeting new people.
String.Dest: 我更喜欢和平的年代。可以前往新的城镇，可以见到新的人们。

String.Source: When I forge, I think of all the spear-maidens and shield-brothers, braving the snowstorms, with nothing but their armor to keep them company.
String.Dest: 当我锻造的时候,脑子里想的全是战矛少女和盾牌兄弟们冒着暴风雪，不是其他，而是盔甲让他们团结在一起的画面。

String.Source: With some armors, the arrows get stuck inside you. Harder to heal.
String.Dest: 你现在穿着盔甲，箭已经射进你的身体里了。这个很难治疗。

String.Source: True, but if an arrow pierces the heart, you won't have a body left to heal. But I guess that's why a lot of light armor only protects certain areas.
String.Dest: 正解，但如果被一箭穿心的话，你就没有一具奄奄一息的身体能留下等着痊愈了。不过我猜这就是很多轻甲只护住某些特定位置的原因。

String.Source: With some armors, the arrows get stuck inside you. Harder to heal.
String.Dest: 你现在穿着盔甲，箭已经射进你的身体里了。这个很难治疗。

String.Source: Anyhow, I can talk about smithing all day, but I'm sure you'd rather not. Do you have family back in Elsweyr? Any brothers or sisters?
String.Dest: 总之，我可以谈论打铁的事儿一整天，但我很肯定你不想这么干。你有家人在艾斯维尔吗？你有兄弟姐妹吗？

String.Source: What if I were standing on a large pile of manure?
String.Dest: 那如果当时我是站在巨大的一堆肥料上呢？

String.Source: I'd dive in, my love. Then I'd make sure to grab a handful for your dinner. You don't want to poke fun at the person who cooks your meals.
String.Dest: 我要开吃啦，亲爱的。我很确定在你的晚餐面前我的吃货本性会暴露无遗的。你不会想去作弄给你做饭的人的。

String.Source: What if I were standing on a large pile of manure?
String.Dest: 那如果当时我是站在巨大的一堆肥料上呢？

String.Source: Your mother should've taught you that. Which reminds me, I've never asked you about your family, have I?
String.Dest: 你的老妈应该教过你这点才对。哦，这样说起来我好像从来没有问过关于你家庭的事情，对吗？

String.Source: I'd like that.
String.Dest: 我……希望我能。

String.Source: I'd like that.
String.Dest: 我喜欢这个。

String.Source: Our story practically writes itself. All that's left is for you to save the town!(Laughs)
String.Dest: 我们的故事几乎是自己写出来的。对你来说剩下的就是去拯救一个城镇了！（大笑）

String.Source: I'd like that.
String.Dest: 我……希望我能。

String.Source: I'd like that.
String.Dest: 我喜欢这个。

String.Source: No, but really, I have a good feeling about you. You can do a lot of good around here.
String.Dest: 不，但是真的，我对你的感觉不赖。你能给这片地方做很多好事。

String.Source: I'd like that.
String.Dest: 我……希望我能。

String.Source: I'd like that.
String.Dest: 我喜欢这个。

String.Source: Maybe then, when you come by the forge, I'll have something worthy of you. But for now, it's getting late, and I have a long day ahead of me.
String.Dest: Maybe then, when you come by the forge, I'll have something worthy of you. But for now, it's getting late, and I have a long day ahead of me.

String.Source: I'd like that.
String.Dest: 我……希望我能。

String.Source: I'd like that.
String.Dest: 我喜欢这个。

String.Source: Until next time.
String.Dest: 下回见。

String.Source: I would be honored to have you by my side. Even if it's just as a shield.
String.Dest: 有你陪伴是我的荣幸，尽管你只是来当肉盾的。

String.Source: And I too would be honored to protect you, even as you protect us all.
String.Dest: 而我也很荣幸能保护您，即使您在保护我们所有人。

String.Source: I would be honored to have you by my side. Even if it's just as a shield.
String.Dest: 有你陪伴是我的荣幸，尽管你只是来当肉盾的。

String.Source: The truth is, I've always dreamed of someone like you coming into town, righting wrongs, helping the townsfolk.
String.Dest: 事实上，我一直梦想你这样的人到城里来，伸张正义，帮助市民。

String.Source: I would be honored to have you by my side. Even if it's just as a shield.
String.Dest: 有你陪伴是我的荣幸，尽管你只是来当肉盾的。

String.Source: And maybe falling in love with the blacksmith's apprentice.
String.Dest: 并且可能爱上了铁匠的学徒……

String.Source: I would be honored to have you by my side. Even if it's just as a shield.
String.Dest: 有你陪伴是我的荣幸，尽管你只是来当肉盾的。

String.Source: I'd forge your weapons and armor, and they would keep you company on the lonely road.
String.Dest: 我可以锻造你的武器和盔甲，这样它们就能在你那孤独的旅途中守护着你了。

String.Source: I would be honored to have you by my side. Even if it's just as a shield.
String.Dest: 有你陪伴是我的荣幸，尽管你只是来当肉盾的。

String.Source: And when you came home, I'd hammer out any dent, sharpen every edge. So your weapons and our love, would be born anew.
String.Dest: 每当你回家的时候，我都会敲平盔甲上的凹痕，磨利刀剑上的钝处。因此你的武器和我们的爱，都能得以重获新生。

String.Source: Yes, it's not like the actual Skyforge would stand out or anything.
String.Dest: 是啊，它确实不像天空熔炉那么超群或者别的什么的。

String.Source: (Laughs) Yeah, Adrianne said as much. She pointed up to that great eagle and said "Child, if this is the Skyforge, what in Oblivion is that thing?"
String.Dest: (笑声) 是啊，就像女铁匠说的那样。她指向雄鹰，说：“孩子，如果这是天空熔炉，在湮灭领域中又是什么呢？”"

String.Source: Yes, it's not like the actual Skyforge would stand out or anything.
String.Dest: 是啊，它确实不像天空熔炉那么超群或者别的什么的。

String.Source: I think that's when the ale spit out of Ulfberth's nose.
String.Dest: 我想那是在从乌弗瑞克的鼻子里喷出麦芽酒的时候。

String.Source: Are you the local blacksmith?
String.Dest: 你是本地的铁匠吗？

String.Source: No, that would be Lod. Big, burly fellow, but don't let that scare you. He's a friendly sort, and loyal as a dog.
String.Dest: 不，那人肯定不是罗德。他长得又高大又结实，但别被吓到。他是个很友善的人，和猎狗一样忠诚。

String.Source: Are you the local blacksmith?
String.Dest: 你是本地的铁匠吗？

String.Source: Both to the Empire and to Dengeir. Although I guess that puts him at odds with himself.
String.Dest: 向帝国和丹格尔两者效忠。我想这使他违背了自己誓言。

String.Source: Are you the local blacksmith?
String.Dest: 你是本地的铁匠吗？

String.Source: I'm just an apprentice, and a wayward traveler like yourself. I'm actually on a pilgrimage to train under the great blacksmiths of Skyrim.
String.Dest: 我只是个学徒，只是个像你一样四处漂泊的旅人。实际上，我是慕天际省那精湛的锻造技艺而来，希望能得到提点的。

String.Source: Are you the local blacksmith?
String.Dest: 你是本地的铁匠吗？

String.Source: When I'm finished, I'll return to my home in Cyrodiil, and hopefully, apply what I've learned to the family business.
String.Dest: 当我完成的时候，我会回到我在赛瑞迪尔的家，也希望能把我学会的东西应用到家族生意上来。

String.Source: Blacksmiths are like flies. If one dies, there are plenty more milling about.
String.Dest: 铁匠就像锉刀。坏一个，其他的就需要更多的磨练。

String.Source: That's not true. A great blacksmith is just as rare as a legendary hero.
String.Dest: 不是那么回事，一个真正的好铁匠可是像传说中的英雄一样罕见。

String.Source: Blacksmiths are like flies. If one dies, there are plenty more milling about.
String.Dest: 铁匠就像锉刀。坏一个，其他的就需要更多的磨练。

String.Source: But it's more than that. I want to forge weapons that reflect my passion for the cause. I want warriors to look at my steel and feel inspired.
String.Dest: 但是还不止这些。我想锻造出能映射为此付出的我的热情的武器，我想要战士们看着我的钢铁感到鼓舞和振奋。

String.Source: Blacksmiths are like flies. If one dies, there are plenty more milling about.
String.Dest: 铁匠就像锉刀。坏一个，其他的就需要更多的磨练。

String.Source: And that's something that just can't be replaced.
String.Dest: 而这件事情恰好不能被替换。

String.Source: Adrianne didn't think so. She pointed up to the great eagle perched high beside Dragonsreach and said:
String.Dest: 阿德里安娜并不这么认为。她指着龙临堡高处旁筑巢的那只巨鹰，然后说：

String.Source: It was an easy mistake.
String.Dest: 这是个容易犯的错误。

String.Source: Child, if this is the Skyforge, what in Oblivion is that thing?
String.Dest: Child, if this is the Skyforge, what in Oblivion is that thing?

String.Source: It was an easy mistake.
String.Dest: 这是个容易犯的错误。

String.Source: Oh, I'm sorry. Adrianne and her husband run Warmaiden's, a smithing shop in Whiterun.
String.Dest: 哦，我很抱歉。阿德里安娜和她的丈夫在雪漫城经营着一家铁匠铺：战争少女。

String.Source: I've never met Adrianne, so to be honest, I don't get what you mean.
String.Dest: 我从没见过阿德里安娜，所以说实话，我不明白你什么意思。

String.Source: It's a small shop, about the size of Lod's place. So when I told her I thought it was the Skyforge, she had a pretty good laugh at my expense.
String.Dest: It's a small shop, about the size of Lod's place. So when I told her I thought it was the Skyforge, she had a pretty good laugh at my expense.

String.Source: I've never met Adrianne, so to be honest, I don't get what you mean.
String.Dest: 我从没见过阿德里安娜，所以说实话，我不明白你什么意思。

String.Source: She pointed up to that great eagle and said "Child, if this is the Skyforge, what in Oblivion is that thing?"
String.Dest: 她指向上方的巨大鹰状标饰说道：”孩子，若这是天空熔炉，在湮灭又是什么？“

String.Source: I've never met Adrianne, so to be honest, I don't get what you mean.
String.Dest: 我从没见过阿德里安娜，所以说实话，我不明白你什么意思。

String.Source: Of course, my love. I knew this day would come, and I'd be lying if I said I wasn't scared.
String.Dest: 当然，亲爱的。我知道这一天终将到来的。如果我说不怕的话，那是撒谎。

String.Source: It's time, my love. I'm off to vanquish the World Eater. Wish me luck.
String.Dest: 是时候了亲爱的。我要去除掉奥杜因。祝我们好运吧。

String.Source: But I believe in you, and I love you. And I know not even the World Eater can keep you from coming back to me.
String.Dest: 但我相信你，我爱你。我也知道甚至连世界吞噬者也只能让你回到我身边。

String.Source: It's time, my love. I'm off to vanquish the World Eater. Wish me luck.
String.Dest: 是时候了亲爱的。我要去除掉奥杜因。祝我们好运吧。

String.Source: So vanquish him, my love. Shout him down from the heavens, and make him rue the day he returned to the realm of the living.
String.Dest: 打败他，我的爱人。用你的怒吼把他从高天震落，让他后悔降临在凡间。

String.Source: It's time, my love. I'm off to vanquish the World Eater. Wish me luck.
String.Dest: 是时候了亲爱的。我要去除掉奥杜因。祝我们好运吧。

String.Source: Because I refuse to believe this is goodbye. I'll be waiting for you right here, as I always have.
String.Dest: 因为我不相信这是再见。我会永远在这儿等着你。

String.Source: It's time, my love. I'm off to vanquish the World Eater. Wish me luck.
String.Dest: 是时候了亲爱的。我要去除掉奥杜因。祝我们好运吧。

String.Source: I always knew you could do it. I knew if I kept waiting, that one day you'd come home.
String.Dest: 我就知道你能做得到. 我知道只要等着, 总有一天你会回家的.。

String.Source: I've done it, my love. Alduin is dead. The world is safe again.
String.Dest: 我成功了！亲爱的。奥杜因已死。整个世界又安全了。

String.Source: And here you are, back from eternity, none the worse for wear. I love you.
String.Dest: 给你，一直到永远，永远也不会改变，我爱你。

String.Source: I've done it, my love. Alduin is dead. The world is safe again.
String.Dest: 我成功了！亲爱的。奥杜因已死。整个世界又安全了。

String.Source: Since the day you came to Lod's shop in Falkreath, I've loved you. Although I guess now that you saved it, the whole world feels the same.
String.Dest: 在你踏入佛克瑞斯的洛德商店的那一瞬间，我就爱上了你。不过我猜你现在已经拯救完了世界了……对吗，一切又恢复往常了呢。

String.Source: I've done it, my love. Alduin is dead. The world is safe again.
String.Dest: 我成功了！亲爱的。奥杜因已死。整个世界又安全了。

String.Source: (Laughs) Considering everything you've done for me and the people, I suppose I can learn to share.
String.Dest: (笑声)考虑到你对我和人们所做的一切，我感觉应该可以试着去分享一下。

String.Source: I've done it, my love. Alduin is dead. The world is safe again.
String.Dest: 我成功了！亲爱的。奥杜因已死。整个世界又安全了。

String.Source: Welcome home, my love. Let us enjoy this new world together.
String.Dest: 欢迎回家，我的爱人！一起来享受新生活吧。

String.Source: I've done it, my love. Alduin is dead. The world is safe again.
String.Dest: 我成功了！亲爱的。奥杜因已死。整个世界又安全了。

String.Source: That's right. I've got a bit of news. Oh, don't worry, it's not that. Although, someday I hope we can have children of our own.
String.Dest: 没错。我有一些好消息。哦，别担心，不是那样的。虽然我希望有一天我们可以拥有我们自己的孩子。

String.Source: You look like you want to tell me something.
String.Dest: 你的表情告诉我你有话要说。

String.Source: Remember when we first met? I told you it was always my dream to forge something for a true hero, and a true love.
String.Dest: 还记得我们什么时候相遇的吗？我跟你说，我一直梦想打造什么东西去给一名真正的英雄，和我真正的爱人。

String.Source: You look like you want to tell me something.
String.Dest: 你的表情告诉我你有话要说。

String.Source: And a hero you are. You're the dragonborn, the one the people have been waiting for.
String.Dest: 而你是个英雄。你是龙裔，我一直在等待的人。

String.Source: You look like you want to tell me something.
String.Dest: 你的表情告诉我你有话要说。

String.Source: More importantly, you're my husband, and the only person I've ever wanted.
String.Dest: 更重要的是，你是我丈夫，是那个唯一让我朝思暮想的人。

String.Source: You look like you want to tell me something.
String.Dest: 你的表情告诉我你有话要说。

String.Source: And so, with that feeling in my heart, I've forged a gift for you.
String.Dest: 因此，这种感觉深埋在我的心间。我打造了个礼物送你。

String.Source: You look like you want to tell me something.
String.Dest: 你的表情告诉我你有话要说。

String.Source: That's right. I've got a bit of news.
String.Dest: 没错。我确实听到些风声。

String.Source: You look like you want to tell me something.
String.Dest: 你的表情告诉我你有话要说。

String.Source: Remember when we first met? I told you it was always my dream to forge something for a true hero, and a true love.
String.Dest: 还记得我们什么时候相遇的吗？我跟你说，我一直梦想打造什么东西去给一名真正的英雄，和我真正的爱人。

String.Source: You look like you want to tell me something.
String.Dest: 你的表情告诉我你有话要说。

String.Source: And a hero you are. You're the dragonborn, the one these people have been waiting for.
String.Dest: 而且你是个英雄。你是龙裔，你就是那个这些人一直在等待的人。

String.Source: You look like you want to tell me something.
String.Dest: 你的表情告诉我你有话要说。

String.Source: More importantly, you're my wife, and the only person I've ever wanted.
String.Dest: 更重要的是，你是我的爱人，我生命之中的唯一。

String.Source: You look like you want to tell me something.
String.Dest: 你的表情告诉我你有话要说。

String.Source: And so, with that feeling in my heart, I've forged a gift for you.
String.Dest: 因此，这种感觉深埋在我的心间。我打造了个礼物送你。

String.Source: You look like you want to tell me something.
String.Dest: 你的表情告诉我你有话要说。

String.Source: I told you when we got married that I was your sword and your shield. I'm also a shoulder, and I can carry your burdens. What troubles you, my love?
String.Dest: 我们结婚的时候我就跟你说过了。我是你的利剑，你的坚盾。也是一双你可以依靠的肩膀，为你排忧解难。什么事儿让你烦心呢？亲爱的？？

String.Source: Isobel, my love. Something's troubling me and I need your advice.
String.Dest: 亲爱的伊莎贝尔，有些事难住我了，我需要你的建议。

String.Source: You know I can't get enough of your adventures, my love. What is it this time?
String.Dest: 亲爱的，你知道我一直是你那冒险故事的忠实粉丝。那么这次怎么了？

String.Source: Isobel. You'll never guess what happened out there.
String.Dest: 伊莎贝尔，你肯定无法想象外面究竟发生了什么。

String.Source: Well, that's a scary way to start a conversation. What's the matter?
String.Dest: 呃，你这么搭讪可够吓人的。怎么啦？

String.Source: I want us to be honest with each other. There's some things you should know.
String.Dest: 我希望我们能够对彼此坦诚。这里有些事情是你需要知道的。

String.Source: I just want to sort of apologize in advance for my cooking. I know I'm not that great in the kitchen. Not many blacksmiths are.
String.Dest: 我想提前对我的烹饪表示抱歉，我知道我不是一个好厨师，大多数铁匠都不是。

String.Source: Is something the matter?
String.Dest: 有什么关系么?

String.Source: Is something the matter?
String.Dest: 出了什么事吗？

String.Source: It's not like I'm going to leave any nails or metal shavings in your soup, but I pretty much just follow the recipe.
String.Dest: 我当然不太可能在你的汤里落下什么钉子刀子之类，不过基本上也只能按配方做而已。

String.Source: Is something the matter?
String.Dest: 有什么关系么?

String.Source: Is something the matter?
String.Dest: 出了什么事吗？

String.Source: Speaking of which, if you come across the book "Uncommon Taste" in your travels, make sure to bring it home. I could use the advice.
String.Dest: 话说你旅行的时候如果找到那本"不同寻常的美味" , 请千万把它带回来。我可以借鉴学习一下.

String.Source: Is something the matter?
String.Dest: 有什么关系么?

String.Source: Is something the matter?
String.Dest: 出了什么事吗？

String.Source: No my dear, I'm not from Kvatch.
String.Dest: 不，亲爱的，我不是来自科瓦奇城。

String.Source: I figured. A lot of the Imperial cities share similarities, but given Kvatch's history, folks are tight knit, and we know each other by first name.
String.Dest: 我想。很多帝国的城市都有相似之处，但科瓦奇城的历史中，人们关系密切，我们认识每个人，而且都直呼其名。

String.Source: No my dear, I'm not from Kvatch.
String.Dest: 不，亲爱的，我不是来自科瓦奇城。

String.Source: It's like one big extended family, my love, and we value every single person, from the beggars to the lords.
String.Dest: It's like one big extended family, my love, and we value every single person, from the beggars to the lords.

String.Source: No my dear, I'm not from Kvatch.
String.Dest: 不，亲爱的，我不是来自科瓦奇城。

String.Source: But enough about me. What about you? Any family?
String.Dest: 我的事儿说够了，谈谈你吧？你有什么家人吗？

String.Source: I hail from Black Marsh.
String.Dest: 我来自黑沼泽。

String.Source: From the villages, my love, or one of the major settlements? I've heard Gideon isn't all that different from Kvatch, or any other Imperial city.
String.Dest: From the villages, my love, or one of the major settlements? I've heard Gideon isn't all that different from Kvatch, or any other Imperial city.

String.Source: That's none of your concern.
String.Dest: 那不用你操心。

String.Source: I'm your wife. How is it not? You should know by now that I'm not all that fond of the mysterious type.
String.Dest: 我是你的妻子。为什么不用我操心？到现在你也应该知道，我不是那种对未知事物完全沉迷的类型啊。

String.Source: That's none of your concern.
String.Dest: 那不用你操心。

String.Source: What about family? Do you have any brothers or sisters? They weren't at the wedding.
String.Dest: 那么家庭呢？你还有兄弟或者姐妹吗？婚礼的时候他们可没来啊。

String.Source: A sword no doubt. I will hold it in my hand, as if I was holding yours.
String.Dest: 毫无疑问是把剑，我会紧紧地握住它，就像握着你的剑一样。

String.Source: Then I made the right choice in fashioning this blade. In it is everything I am. Take it with you, my love, and hold me close.
String.Dest: Then I made the right choice in fashioning this blade. In it is everything I am. Take it with you, my love, and hold me close.

String.Source: It's all I know. I can't imagine myself as a farmer.
String.Dest: 我只知道这些。不敢想象我成为一个农民。

String.Source: But isn't it more than just a job?
String.Dest: But isn't it more than just a job?

String.Source: It's all I know. I can't imagine myself as a farmer.
String.Dest: 我只知道这些。不敢想象我成为一个农民。

String.Source: When I think of adventurers, I think of people with passion, with fire, and I channel that emotion when I smith their weapons.
String.Dest: 当我想到冒险家的时候，我就想起了那些热情如火的人们。然后我就能在锻造他们的装备时集中精力了。

String.Source: It's all I know. I can't imagine myself as a farmer.
String.Dest: 我只知道这些。不敢想象我成为一个农民。

String.Source: Although granted, it must get lonely out there too. So sometimes I'll forge a pendant, or a ring, just to remind them of home.
String.Dest: 就算是这么回事,我也要独自前往。所以有的时候我要锻造个吊坠, 或者戒指什么的, 作为一个家的留念。

String.Source: It's the Blades. They want me to kill Paarthurnax.
String.Dest: 是刀锋战士，是他们想让我杀了帕图纳克斯的。

String.Source: What? The dragon you met at High Hrothgar? Why would they ask you to do that?
String.Dest: 啥？你去高吼峰见了一条龙？他们为什么要让你去做这种事啊？

String.Source: Valenwood is my home.
String.Dest: 威木省是我的老家。

String.Source: Truly, my love? Was it one of those moving cities I always hear about?
String.Dest: 真的吗，亲爱的？那个我一直听说过的动人的城市？

String.Source: I've joined the Thieves Guild.
String.Dest: 我已经加入了盗贼公会。

String.Source: Why? To destroy it? If not, you should go back there right now and tell them you quit. I didn't marry a thief.
String.Dest: Why? To destroy it? If not, you should go back there right now and tell them you quit. I didn't marry a thief.

String.Source: Have you ever read "Immortal Blood?" Well I just killed Movarth Piquine.
String.Dest: 你读过"不朽之血"这本书吗?哦好吧，其实我就是那个杀掉莫瓦斯·皮其恩的人。

String.Source: That's incredible, my love! Although to be honest, you'll have to remind me who Movarth Piquine is. I don't read much.
String.Dest: 真是不可思议，达令！但是老实说，你应该给我说莫瓦斯·皮其恩是谁。我没有看太多。

String.Source: Have you ever read "Immortal Blood?" Well I just killed Movarth Piquine.
String.Dest: 你读过"不朽之血"这本书吗?哦好吧，其实我就是那个杀掉莫瓦斯·皮其恩的人。

String.Source: I know, I know, just because I'm a smith doesn't mean I should hate reading. I just like listening to tales or hearing them sung.
String.Dest: 我知道，我知道，只是因为我是个铁匠不意味着我就该讨厌读书。我也就是喜欢听听童话或者听他们唱歌而已。

String.Source: I actually grew up in the Dragontail Mountains. Lots of Orcs, lots of old magic.
String.Dest: 其实我在龙尾山脉长大。哪里有很多兽族，很多古老的魔法。

String.Source: Ah, that makes sense, my love. And you've always been a bit rough around the edges. Which is a good thing.
String.Dest: 啊，那可以理解，吾爱。你总是比可接受程度之上还要狂野一点。这是好事。

String.Source: I actually grew up in the Dragontail Mountains. Lots of Orcs, lots of old magic.
String.Dest: 其实我在龙尾山脉长大。哪里有很多兽族，很多古老的魔法。

String.Source: What about family? Do you have any brothers or sisters?
String.Dest: 那么家庭呢？你有兄弟姐妹吗？

String.Source: I'd like your opinion on the Civil War.
String.Dest: 关于内战，我同意你的观点。

String.Source: I came here to help the Empire and put an end to Ulfric's reckless ambition. But now, I think the whole thing is childish and stupid.
String.Dest: 我来这里是为了帮助帝国终结乌佛瑞克胆大妄为的野心。但现在，我觉得整件事都是幼稚而愚蠢的。

String.Source: I'd like your opinion on the Civil War.
String.Dest: 关于内战，我同意你的观点。

String.Source: The dragons are the real threat. Bigger than the Aldmeri, bigger than even the Oblivion Crisis. That's where your focus should be.
String.Dest: 龙才是真正的威胁，先祖神州啊湮灭危机什么的跟它相比都不值一提。这才是你应该注意的重点啊。

String.Source: (Laughs) A lot of people come around here saying the same. But you're the first one I believe.
String.Dest: (笑声) 很多来这附近的人都这么说。但是你是第一个我相信的人。

String.Source: You have no idea. I am <Alias=Player>. I am the Dragonborn. I...am a legend.
String.Dest: 我没有意见，我是 <Alias=Player>. 我就是龙裔。我...就是一个传奇。

String.Source: It's always been my dream to smith weapons and armor for a real hero. And if the rumors are true, well...I just hope I'm not blushing.
String.Dest: 我一直梦想能用我的作品武装一位真正的英雄。不过要是传言不虚，呃……希望我的脸现在没那么红。

String.Source: You have no idea. I am <Alias=Player>. I am the Dragonborn. I...am a legend.
String.Dest: 我没有意见，我是 <Alias=Player>. 我就是龙裔。我...就是一个传奇。

String.Source: (Laughs) A lot of people come around here saying the same. But you're the first one I believe.
String.Dest: (笑声) 很多来这附近的人都这么说。但是你是第一个我相信的人。

String.Source: You have no idea. I am <Alias=Player>. In time, my name will be legend.
String.Dest: 你不知道。我是 <Alias=Player>. 假以时日，我的名字会成为传奇。

String.Source: It's always been my dream to smith weapons and armor for a real hero. I'll remember your name. Hopefully you won't disappoint me.
String.Dest: It's always been my dream to smith weapons and armor for a real hero. I'll remember your name. Hopefully you won't disappoint me.

String.Source: You have no idea. I am <Alias=Player>. In time, my name will be legend.
String.Dest: 你不知道。我是 <Alias=Player>. 假以时日，我的名字会成为传奇。

String.Source: Or we can go to Cyrodiil so I can meet your parents.
String.Dest: 要不然我们去赛瑞迪尔一起见你父母。

String.Source: (Laughs) That will be awkward. I know I can't put it off forever, but I figure I can put it off until tomorrow. What about you? Do you have family?
String.Dest: (Laughs) That will be awkward. I know I can't put it off forever, but I figure I can put it off until tomorrow. What about you? Do you have family?

String.Source: What are your thoughts on how the ritual with Larsdon went?
String.Dest: 你觉得有劳斯登在，仪式进行得如何？

String.Source: It was exciting, I'll say that. I've never quenched a blade in a living person before, and I doubt I'll ever do it again.
String.Dest: 那可真是太刺激了，我绝对从来没有拿活人做过锻造冷淬，不过恐怕也不会再做了。

String.Source: What are your thoughts on how the ritual with Larsdon went?
String.Dest: 你觉得有劳斯登在，仪式进行得如何？

String.Source: It's amazing he survived. But I always knew he would.
String.Dest: 他能存活下来真是惊人。尽管我一直相信他能办到的。

String.Source: Until next time.
String.Dest: 下回见。

String.Source: Good steel's worth every septim, remember that.
String.Dest: Good steel's worth every septim, remember that.

String.Source: May your shield be stout, and your sword steady.
String.Dest: May your shield be stout, and your sword steady.

String.Source: Well met.
String.Dest: 幸会。

String.Source: Greetings.
String.Dest: 你好。

String.Source: I noticed your horse seemed to favor one foot. You should let me make him some proper shoes, keep him from getting injured on these cobbled roads.
String.Dest: I noticed your horse seemed to favor one foot. You should let me make him some proper shoes, keep him from getting injured on these cobbled roads.

String.Source: Sweetheart, you should let me make your horse some proper shoes, keep him from getting injured on these cobbled roads.
String.Dest: 甜心，你应该给我们的马找些合适的鞋子，这样它就不会再因踏过鹅卵石的小路而上受伤了。

String.Source: If you work the forge, remember, it isn't just the hammer that strikes the blade. It's the anvil as well.
String.Dest: If you work the forge, remember, it isn't just the hammer that strikes the blade. It's the anvil as well.

String.Source: Some say the weather in Skyrim is cold, but a long night working the forge is enough to warm any man's bones.
String.Dest: 有人说天际从来天寒地冻，但是在锻炉旁边叮叮当当一整晚，谁都会从里到外暖和起来的。

String.Source: There's been some attacks late at night, mostly on the livestock around town. I better forge some better blades for the guards, just in case.
String.Dest: 这段时间的夜晚已经发生了好几次针对镇子周边的家畜的袭击了。为了以防万一，我最好还是给守卫们打造点好的武器。

String.Source: Some of the local miners brought back some real stubborn pieces of ore. It'll take some extra care to turn them into proper weapons.
String.Dest: 当地的一些矿工带回一些真正难处理的矿石。我会特别照料它们，让它们成为合适的武器。

String.Source: Hide and fur armor can help camouflage you in the forest. But a true warrior takes his foe head on.
String.Dest: Hide and fur armor can help camouflage you in the forest. But a true warrior takes his foe head on.

String.Source: A lot of hunters come here to buy light armor. Soldiers prefer the heavy plate.
String.Dest: A lot of hunters come here to buy light armor. Soldiers prefer the heavy plate.

String.Source: The blades and armor here are forged with purpose.
String.Dest: The blades and armor here are forged with purpose.

String.Source: I take care in every piece I fashion, because I know it's the difference between life and death.
String.Dest: I take care in every piece I fashion, because I know it's the difference between life and death.

String.Source: That Thalmor has been fighting a lot of duels with the local Nords. Best be careful around her.
String.Dest: That Thalmor has been fighting a lot of duels with the local Nords. Best be careful around her.

String.Source: (Sigh) Olette, we talked about this. You don't have to go hunting for your dinner anymore. I have a warm meal ready for you on the table.
String.Dest: (叹气)欧列特, 我们谈过这个了。你不用为晚餐去打猎了。我已经把热乎的食物放在桌子上了。

String.Source: Are you positive? You know I don't like being lied to.
String.Dest: 你肯定吗？你知道我不喜欢被人骗。

String.Source: Olette, have you been hunting skeevers in the tunnels again?
String.Dest: 欧列特，你又在隧道里虐杀雪鼠了吗？

String.Source: It's well known that on the 25th of Evening Star, the Hero of Kvatch comes to town on a great big sled and gives presents to all the children.
String.Dest: 众所周知，在夜星月25日，科瓦奇的英雄(注：四代主角）将会乘着雪橇给镇上的所有小孩送上礼物。

String.Source: I want to ask you some more personal questions.
String.Dest: 我要问你一些更加私人的问题。

String.Source: Lod, I'm thankful for the room and board, but maybe it's best I stay somewhere else. What if people get the wrong idea?
String.Dest: Lod, I'm thankful for the room and board, but maybe it's best I stay somewhere else. What if people get the wrong idea?

String.Source: Lod, is it me, or are we low on iron? Do we have enough for the next shipment?
String.Dest: Lod, is it me, or are we low on iron? Do we have enough for the next shipment?

String.Source: Whatever happened to that young lad who used to come by here to get his weapon sharpened?
String.Dest: Whatever happened to that young lad who used to come by here to get his weapon sharpened?

String.Source: You must miss those days. But if you can't swing your weapon, forging one's the next best thing.
String.Dest: You must miss those days. But if you can't swing your weapon, forging one's the next best thing.

String.Source: So Lod, is it true you weren't always a blacksmith?
String.Dest: So Lod, is it true you weren't always a blacksmith?

String.Source: (Laughs) We'll see.
String.Dest: (笑声)我们等着瞧。

String.Source: I would love to, Olette. When you're old enough.
String.Dest: 我很想那么做，欧列特。当你再大点儿的时候。

String.Source: Really? I didn't think she was his type.
String.Dest: 真的？我可没觉得她会是他的菜。

String.Source: Really? I didn't think he was his type.
String.Dest: 真的？我可没觉得他会是他的菜。

String.Source: Perhaps someone with a good laugh.
String.Dest: 或许某人该大笑一番。

String.Source: Is Rumarin married? We ought to set him up with someone nice.
String.Dest: 罗米勒结婚了吗？我们应该给他介绍某个好人家。

String.Source: No, everything is perfect.
String.Dest: 不，一切都很好。

String.Source: Aye, that it is love. Those nights at the forge can make you regret your chosen craft.
String.Dest: 赞成，这都是爱。那些在熔炉的岁月会让你为曾经选择的手艺而感叹。

String.Source: No, everything is perfect.
String.Dest: 不，一切都很好。

String.Source: But right now makes it worth all the sweat and tears. I'll suffer all the twists and turns to be here, at the end, with the one I love.
String.Dest: 但是现在，它值得我所有的甜蜜与泪水。我愿意承受一切波折险阻，与我的爱人走到最后。

String.Source: I know what everyone did, but I wasn't there. My mind was in another place.
String.Dest: 我知道别人都怎么想，但是我当时并不算是在那里。我当时在琢磨其他的事。

String.Source: Sounds like some dark magic. Still, it doesn't matter where you started, but where you finished, and this is a fine place to be.
String.Dest: 听起来似乎是某种黑魔法。不过，你从哪开始的并不重要，在哪结束才比较重要。到了这步你也应该结束了。

String.Source: I know what everyone did, but I wasn't there. My mind was in another place.
String.Dest: 我知道别人都怎么想，但是我当时并不算是在那里。我当时在琢磨其他的事。

String.Source: And if you really don't remember, your body will. I still have aches in my arms from forging all those weapons.
String.Dest: 就算你不记得了，你的身体也会记得。现在我的胳膊还因为锻造这些武器经常疼痛。

String.Source: You won't believe this, but this all seems like a dream.
String.Dest: 你不会相信这些的，所有这些就像一个梦。

String.Source: My love, if this a dream, then does it matter what's real? We're together right now, and I can't think of any other place I'd rather be.
String.Dest: 亲爱的，如果这是一个梦，那么管它什么是真的呢？此时此刻，我们在一起，这就足够了，我不想去任何其他的地方。

String.Source: I'm just glad you're here, love. This world wouldn't be the same without you.
String.Dest: 真高兴你在这里，亲爱的。没有你的世界，什么都变了样。

String.Source: Of course I'm here, love. You make it sound like I would've missed a party for my own spouse! Or is there something else troubling you?
String.Dest: 亲爱的，我在呢，一直都在。你这样让我觉得，好像刚刚错过一场只为你而开的盛会！还是，有别的事情让你烦心？

String.Source: I'm glad you could make it to the party.
String.Dest: 我很高兴你能让它来参加聚会。

String.Source: I wouldn't have missed it. It's my chance to honor the Dragonborn, a Hero of Riverwood, and the one who stopped Gren's rebellion.
String.Dest: 我不能错过。为了尊敬的龙裔，溪木镇的英雄，那个可以阻止格伦叛乱的人。

String.Source: I'm glad you could make it to the party.
String.Dest: 我很高兴你能让它来参加聚会。

String.Source: So here's to you. May your weapons never rust, and your shield never break.
String.Dest: 所以这是给你的。愿你的武器永不生锈，盾牌永不破碎。

String.Source: Isobel, fine job on forging that axe.
String.Dest: 伊莎贝尔，这斧子铸得好哇。

String.Source: Which one? I forged almost a dozen axes, bows, and armor for all those people you saved at Angarvunde.
String.Dest: 哪一个？我给那些你从安枷坟救出来的人打造了成堆的斧头弓箭盔甲什么的。

String.Source: Isobel, fine job on forging that axe.
String.Dest: 伊莎贝尔，这斧子铸得好哇。

String.Source: Amazing how much fire was in their eyes. They must've really hated this war-teacher who tortured them.
String.Dest: 他们的眼中燃烧着多麽愤恨的火焰啊。他们肯定特别讨厌这个把他们折磨得生不如死的战争导师。

String.Source: Rumarin, when are you going to give up those bound blades and wield a proper weapon?
String.Dest: 罗米勒，你什么时候才能把那些召唤武器放下改拿一把正常的武器呢？

String.Source: Karras, what's the word on that contract? I've got a stock of weapons and armor ready to go.
String.Dest: 卡拉斯，契约上写了什么？ 我得准备去进一批武器和盔甲的货了。

String.Source: Hear, hear!
String.Dest: 我同意！

String.Source: Anum-La, I'd love to fashion a blade for you. Does your company have a sigil?
String.Dest: Anum-La, I'd love to fashion a blade for you. Does your company have a sigil?

String.Source: Is Rumarin married? We ought to set him up with someone nice.
String.Dest: 罗米勒结婚了吗？我们应该给他介绍某个好人家。

String.Source: Well, pretty much any pairing will work that doesn't involve Skjarn.
String.Dest: 唉，几乎每对没有史卡盎捣乱的组合都很有成效。

String.Source: Really? I didn't think she was his type.
String.Dest: 真的？我可没觉得她会是他的菜。

String.Source: Really? I didn't think he was his type.
String.Dest: 真的？我可没觉得他会是他的菜。

String.Source: Perhaps someone with a good laugh.
String.Dest: 或许某人该大笑一番。

String.Source: Oh, I'm sorry. What happened to them?
String.Dest: 哦，我很抱歉。他们怎么啦？

String.Source: (Laughter)
String.Dest: (笑声)

String.Source: To the Dragonborn!
String.Dest: 龙裔万岁！

String.Source: Huzzah!
String.Dest: 好啊！

String.Source: Damn all this bureaucracy! The soldiers in the field need those weapons now!
String.Dest: 去你妈的官僚主义！ 这些战场上的士兵现在就需要武器！

String.Source: That's the cost of staying alive, Elf. Don't be cheap when it comes to that.
String.Dest: 那就是求生的代价，精灵。到这时你可别贪便宜。

String.Source: That's not exactly how it works. They're quenched in Daedric blood, but the weapons themselves are made here.
String.Dest: 确切地说不是那样。武器确实是用魔族血来冷却的，但打造那些武器的地点是在这儿。

String.Source: Speech!
String.Dest: 说话！

String.Source: I might have had too much to drink. I don't think I'll be working the forge tomorrow.
String.Dest: 我可能有点喝过头了，恐怕明天是没法上炉干活了。

String.Source: I wonder if Eorlund is taking on apprentices? Probably not, he doesn't seem like the sort.
String.Dest: I wonder if Eorlund is taking on apprentices? Probably not, he doesn't seem like the sort.

String.Source: I'd like to work the Skyforge just once. Maybe I'll sneak on over there after the party.
String.Dest: 就算只有一次，我也想用一次天空熔炉，也许我应该在聚会之后偷偷的去一趟。

String.Source: I don't like the looks of that Nord, Skjarn. He keeps winking at me.
String.Dest: 我不喜欢诺德人的长相，史卡盎。他一直在对我使眼色。
